title: KODAK Dock ERA Plus 4PASS Instant Photo Printer (4x6) (Printer + 10 Sheets)
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Photo Printers › Desktop Photo Printers
features: [Gift that brings happiness all the time] It will truly bring joy for you to gift your Kodak Dock ERA Plus to your loved ones. Gift this photo printer to your loved ones and capture a lifetime of happy moments with them.

[Premium Quality Prints] 24Bit / 16.7 Million Colors. Refined saturation and enhanced color display by ‘Highlight Saturation’ improvement. Utilizing 4PASS technology, the Kodak Dock ERA Plus delivers flawless prints. The laminated, multi-layered prints are fingerprint and water-resistant, ensuring your memories last a lifetime.

[Dock, Print & Charge] This photo printer offers seamless docking and charging for your phone while instantly printing your photos. Compatible with Apple iPhone, iPad & Android devices, it also supports wireless Bluetooth connection.

[Two Photo Types] Tailor your photo experience with the Kodak Dock ERA, offering the choice between bordered and borderless prints. With this photo printer, you can create lasting memories by writing down your memories in the border type.

[Lowest Photo Cost] Say goodbye to expensive photos! Experience cost-effective photo printing with the Kodak Dock ERA, the most budget-friendly option for printing from the comfort of your home. Save even more with photos at half the cost when purchased in a cartridge bundle!

[Brand-New Design] Inspired by Retro 35mm Kodak Film Legacy, drawing inspiration from the timeless aesthetic of retro 35mm Kodak film. The sleek design pays homage to the classic film era, blending nostalgia with modern functionality.

What photo paper and cartridge should be used for the Kodak Dock ERA Plus printer? 
Official Kodak photo paper and cartridge (PHC-80) must be used for the Kodak Dock Plus photo printer, which can be found on Amazon. 
What's included in the package? 
- All products come with a photo printer with user manual, power adapter, iPhone Lightning adaptor, initial cartridge and 10 photo papers. 
- All bundles come with additional 80 sheets of photo paper and cartridge. 
What can you do with the Kodak Photo Printer App? 
With the free Kodak Photo Printer App, you can create frames and make many edits on your photos. 
How can I download Kodak Photo Printer app? 
Search and download 'Kodak Photo Printer' App on Google Play or App Store. 
What should I do if there is an issue with the product? 
Please do not hesitate to contact the Amazon customer support regarding your product and we will do everything we can to help you solve the issue.

title: Liene Photo Printer, 2x3 Mini Instant Portable Color Mono Picture Printer w/ 50 Zink Adhesive Paper, Bluetooth 5.0, Compatible w/iOS & Android, Small Photo Printer for iPhone, Smartphones, Pink
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
features: [No Ink, Economic and Eco-friendly] Drop your ink! The ink is IN the paper, so you don’t have to buy expensive ink cartridges, toner, or ribbon to replace it. Liene Photo Printers with Zink Printing Technology are more affordable and eco-friendly. The photo paper for smartphone printers is long-lasting and anti-staining, waterproof, and tear-resistant. We have high-quality printing technology so that your photos can be presented in the most vivid picture. Get Liene photo printers now for yourself and your loved ones.

[2X3'' Adhesive Photo Paper] This pink portable photo printer has 50 sheets of Zink adhesive picture paper. You can stick it anywhere by tearing off the back sheet. Print off the pictures with our instant photo printer and attach them to your scrapbook or photo album. Print your favorite patterns and cut them to decorate your storage cabinet, computer case, or refrigerator. Our photo paper has excellent stickiness and remarkable color retention to keep your fond memories fresh.

[Portable for Printing Color and Mono Photo Paper] Are you looking for a printer to print color and black and white photos? The Liene mini printer is the solution! This mini photo printer can print great quality colorful photos. In addition, the mini printer can also print film-like photos, which makes the photos look for vintage. You can use your charger to recharge this mini printer with Type-C, and it prints 30 photos on a single charge.

[Easy Connection & Fast Printing] This bluetooth picture printer for iphone and Android phones can be connected quickly and stably via Bluetooth 5.0. Just slide the cover and change the photo paper easily with one hand. Connect the printer to your phone via Bluetooth, then this smartphone printer will print, you can select the image you posted on your social media or save it on your phone, and after 45 seconds, it will become a tangible 2x3-inch photo.

[New App function - Clean print head] Don't know what to do when there are white spots, white lines or other dirt on the photo when printing? The Liene phone printer has added a new feature (clean print head) to the photo app, which greatly solves the problem and gives you better photo quality. Note: A blue calibration card is required when cleaning the print head. See the videos on the product page for details. Note: Photos can only be printed through the Liene app.

title: HP Sprocket Studio Plus 4x6" Wireless Instant Photo Printer – Wi-Fi, Premium Dye Sublimation, Compact - Prints Vibrant Color Pictures from iOS & Android Devices - Editing App for Fun, Creative Photos
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
description: Get everything plus more with the HP Sprocket Studio Plus Printer. This all-in-one printer is the perfect device for printing all those amazing photos you have on your phone. Set up the printer in seconds, download the easy-to-use HP Sprocket app, and connect your smartphone to the printer via Wi-Fi. Now you are all set without a moment wasted. Take pictures, customize them in the photo-editing app, and see your beautiful, captured moments come to life as they are printed. The HP Sprocket Studio Plus Printer creates crisp, detailed prints that you will want to share with friends and family.
features: PHOTOS MADE TO LAST – Print quality photos that will last for years on tear-resistant, smudge-proof, waterproof paper.
CUSTOMIZE YOUR CREATIONS – Add your own style to each photo by decorate it with stickers, frames, filters, and more before you print them out.
INSTANT PRINTING – Designed for efficiency and convenience, this printer will produce dry-to-the-touch 4x6” photos in an instant directly from your smartphone.
WI-FI COMPATIBLITY – Download the user-friendly HP Sprocket app to your smartphone and easily connect your mobile device to Wi-fi-enabled printer in mere seconds.

PICTURE-PERFECT PHOTO FEATURES – The HP Sprocket Studio Plus gives you several different and unique ways to take a photo. Don’t miss out on the chance to make a collage, do a photobooth, create a photo ID, and so much more.

What makes the HP Sprocket Studio Plus printer unique? 
The HP Sprocket Studio Plus printer uses 4x6” photo paper. It uses dye sublimation technology to print the brightest, clearest images in one smooth process. 
How do you connect the printer to the app? 
The HP Sprocket Studio Plus is a Wi-Fi printer. You can pair your smartphone with the printer via Wi-Fi in order to use the HP Sprocket app. 
What can you do with the HP Sprocket app? 
Once the printer is connected to the app, you can use the app to enhance your photos. Add stickers, text, borders, and more to your pictures. Take multiple creative photos together with the phot booth feature. 
What HP photo paper and cartridges are compatible with this printer? 
The pack known as the HP Sprocket Studio Plus 4 x 6 Photo Paper and Cartridge bundle is the only bundle compatible with the HP Sprocket Studio Plus printer. This pack comes with 108 sheets and 2 cartridges. 
Does this printer have a rechargeable battery? 
The HP Sprocket Studio Plus does not come with a rechargeable battery. In order to power the printer, connect the printer to the power source using the AC adapter.

title: HP Sprocket 3x4" Instant Smartphone Photo Printer - Portable Color Wireless Mobile Printer - Zink Sticky-Back Photos - Print from Compatible iOS & Android Devices with Bluetooth w/the Creative App
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
description: Personalize your pictures with HP Sprocket 3x4, instant photo printer. Download the HP Sprocket app on your smartphone and customize your photos before you take them to print. Create fun, vibrant, and colorful prints using borders, stickers and more on the photo-editing app. Share your eye-popping images on social media or spread your 3.5” x 4.25” prints to friends and family. With Zink paper in your printer, your photos produce vivid color without the need of ink. Make your photos your own then print them out on water-resistant, tear-resistant, and sticky-backed Zink paper. The portable design of this printer allows you to capture and print out fantastic moments anywhere you go. Snap beautiful photos on vacation, during holidays, and at parties, then get gorgeous, clear prints of bright smiling faces instantly.
features: PRINTS MADE PICTURE PERFECT – Get beautiful, colorful 3.5” x 4.25” photos with Zink ZERO-INK technology. Instantly print high-quality photos on water-resistant, smudge-proof, and sticky-backed Zink paper with no ink or toner needed.

PRINT LIKE THE WIND – Connect your iOS or Android via Bluetooth and print your favorite photos instantly. With wireless printing, you can quickly print amazing pictures right from your smartphone. HP Sprocket 3x4 even supports multiple users at once.

PERSONALIZE YOUR PICS – Download the HP Sprocket app and customize your photos before you print. Use the simple photo-editing app on your phone to enhance your pictures. Add stickers, borders, filters, and other stunning effects to turn your photo into true art.

PREMIUM TRAVEL-SIZED PRINTING – Compact, lightweight design fits in your bag or backpack without issue. Easily take this portable printer on all your photo-taking adventures. Print out unique, vibrant pictures during your travels with this handheld device.

SHARE AMAZING PRINTS – Share customized photos with friends on social media like Instagram in seconds. Or print out pictures and decorate your room, school locker, or scrapbook with sticky-backed photos. The perfect, photo-sharing gift for influencers, scrapbookers, students, photographers and more.

From the manufacturer
HP Sprocket 3x4 Instant Photo Printer

Think Big, Print Big 
Previous page
Capture Moments on the Go 
Go on vacation, take a trip, or walk to the park ready to print at any time. 
Printing Made Easy 
Create beautiful 3” x 4” prints instantly right from your smartphone via Bluetooth. 
Stick to your Style

Next page
1 Print Anywhere 2 Wireless Printing 3 Sticky backed 
Change It, Style It, Print It! 
Previous page
Size Matters 
Have fun fitting more memories and bigger moments on 3.5” x 4.25” paper. 
Personalized Pics 
With the HP Sprocket app, you can let your creativity loose and stylize your photos your way. 
Brighten Up your Moments 
Select a filter for your photos with the HP Sprocket app to really make your pictures stand out. 
Charge and Print 
Charge up this wireless device in no time at time then print up to 30 photos before charging again. 
Next page
ZINK ZERO INK Technology 
Previous page
Paper Made Tough 
Zink brings you tear-resistant, waterproof, and blot-proof paper that beats out the competition. 
Think Zero Ink 
Spend more time printing and less time worrying about ink, toners, and cartridges when you use Zink. 
Homemade Quality 
Print out photos of family and friends on efficient, long-lasting paper made right in the US. 
Next page
Start creating vibrant prints in four easy steps. 
What makes the HP Sprocket 3x4 printer unique? 
The HP Sprocket 3x4 printer is currently the printer with the biggest sized Zink photo paper. The HP Sprocket 2x3 and Sprocket Select both use smaller paper in their printers. 
Where can I get the HP Sprocket app and what does it do? 
You can download the app from Google Play or the App Store on your Android or iOS device. With this photo-editing app, you can change photo filters, personalize your pictures, and print from your mobile device. 
How do I perform the Bluetooth pairing for my printer? 
First, download the HP Sprocket app and make sure Bluetooth is activated on your mobile device. Next, go into the app and select the printer you wish to add to the printer list. Then, wait for the printer and your mobile device to connect. 
Do I need to replace the batteries? 
No, you do not need to replace the batteries in the printer. The HP Sprocket 3x4 printer is rechargeable. Plug in the device with the included USB cable to charge it. Once it is charged, you can print out 30 photos in a single charge. 
What is HP Sprocket Zink 3” x 4” sticky-backed paper? 
HP Sprocket Zink 3” x 4” sticky-backed paper is 3” x 4” sized photo paper that doesn’t need ink, toners, or cartridges and can be place anywhere with its adhesive backing

modules.title: HP Sprocket 3x4 Instant Photo Printer
modules.text: Think Big, Print Big

items.name: Print Anywhere
items.text: Go on vacation, take a trip, or walk to the park ready to print at any time.

items.name: Wireless Printing
items.text: Create beautiful 3” x 4” prints instantly right from your smartphone via Bluetooth.

items.name: Sticky backed
items.text: Just peel off the backing of the photos and stick the pictures anywhere.

items.title: Size Matters
items.text: Have fun fitting more memories and bigger moments on 3.5” x 4.25” paper.

items.title: Personalized Pics
items.text: With the HP Sprocket app, you can let your creativity loose and stylize your photos your way.

items.title: Brighten Up your Moments
items.text: Select a filter for your photos with the HP Sprocket app to really make your pictures stand out.

items.title: Charge and Print
items.text: Charge up this wireless device in no time at time then print up to 30 photos before charging again.

modules.text: Start creating vibrant prints in four easy steps.

items.title: Paper Made Tough
items.text: Zink brings you tear-resistant, waterproof, and blot-proof paper that beats out the competition.

items.title: Think Zero Ink
items.text: Spend more time printing and less time worrying about ink, toners, and cartridges when you use Zink.

items.title: Homemade Quality
items.text: Print out photos of family and friends on efficient, long-lasting paper made right in the US.

items.name: What makes the HP Sprocket 3x4 printer unique?
items.text: The HP Sprocket 3x4 printer is currently the printer with the biggest sized Zink photo paper. The HP Sprocket 2x3 and Sprocket Select both use smaller paper in their printers.

items.name: Where can I get the HP Sprocket app and what does it do?
items.text: You can download the app from Google Play or the App Store on your Android or iOS device. With this photo-editing app, you can change photo filters, personalize your pictures, and print from your mobile device.

items.name: How do I perform the Bluetooth pairing for my printer?
items.text: First, download the HP Sprocket app and make sure Bluetooth is activated on your mobile device. Next, go into the app and select the printer you wish to add to the printer list. Then, wait for the printer and your mobile device to connect.

items.name: Do I need to replace the batteries?
items.text: No, you do not need to replace the batteries in the printer. The HP Sprocket 3x4 printer is rechargeable. Plug in the device with the included USB cable to charge it. Once it is charged, you can print out 30 photos in a single charge.

items.name: What is HP Sprocket Zink 3” x 4” sticky-backed paper?
items.text: HP Sprocket Zink 3” x 4” sticky-backed paper is 3” x 4” sized photo paper that doesn’t need ink, toners, or cartridges and can be place anywhere with its adhesive backing

title: KODAK Step Instant Smartphone Photo Printer - Portable Mini Color Wireless Mobile Printer - Zink 2x3” Sticky-Back Photos - Bluetooth Compatible with iOS & Android Devices - Fun Editing App - Black
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
description: Print life one step at a time!Whether you’re an avid traveler, social influencer, nostalgic scrapbooker or on-the-go photographer, one thing is certain—printing pictures takes too many steps! Now, with the KODAK Step Printer, printing full-color photographs is faster and easier than ever. Just pair with any Bluetooth- or NFC-enabled smart device, and stunning full-color photo prints are in your hand in under 60 seconds. ZINK Zero Ink technology eliminates the need for expensive inks, toners and ribbons, delivering cool 2”x3” photographs you can peel and stick to any surface. Photos come out clear, bright, colorful and covered with an extra layer of protective coating to prevent smudges, rips and water damage. The KODAK app also lets you customize photos far beyond the usual ‘flip’ and ‘rotate’ of your smartphone. Use our extensive editing tools to apply flattering filters, cutesy stickers, decorative frames and other personalized flair. With mobile printing so quick and simple, you’ll be jamming at concerts, weddings, parties—everywhere but the actual printer!Includes 5 Sticker Frames - Patterns may vary.
features: STEP UP YOUR PRINTING GAME | No more making plans to print tomorrow. | Kodak step printer connects to any ios or android smartphone, tablet or similar device [via Bluetooth or NFC] so you can print pics instantly | Turn your selfies, portraits, social media posts & other images into physical photos

AMAZING ZERO-INK TECHNOLOGY: ZINK innovation eliminates the need for pricy ink cartridges, toners or ribbons. 2” x 3” sticky-back paper with embedded dye crystals delivers high-quality, durable, affordable, beautifully detailed prints that are resistant to moisture, rips, tears & smudges

FULL EDITING SUITE VIA APP | Download the free Kodak App to create collages & customize your snaps with stunning filters, interesting borders, cool stickers, funny text & other personalized flair; Edit photos in your camera roll, then send to step for instant printing in less than 60 seconds

TAKE YOUR PROJECTS TO GO: Skip the Computer Connections, Messy Wires & Clunky Equipment. Our palm-sized printer weighs less than a pound, sets up fast & delivers gorgeous prints you can peel & stick everywhere. Great for decorating a fridge, laptop, locker, scrapbook, notebook & more

CUTE, COMPACT & COLORFUL: Step printer is designed for photo-loving influencers & crafters of all ages & skill levels. Portable, lightweight device features built-in lithium-ion rechargeable battery Prints 25 Photo on a Full Charge: Available in a Variety of Colors—a Fantastic Anytime Gift Idea.
Form factor: Premium Photo Printer
Max print speed black white: 1.0 pages per minute
Max print speed color: 1.0 pages per minute

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Kodak Step App 
Previous page
Expert Editing 
The Kodak Step App provides more than the standard crop and rotate options. Get the picture-perfect print by adjusting brightness, color temperatures, blur settings, and more. 
Creative Collages 
Print up to four images on a single photo with the app’s collage mode. Momentous photo montages are just a moment away. 
Play with your Pics 
Add stickers, filters, and fun frames—even draw directly on your photos from the KODAK STEP PRINTS app! 
Next page
Making photo-printing easy and convenient. 
Previous page
On-the-Go Photography 
Pack the KODAK STEP Printer in your pocket and you’re ready to print, wherever you go! 
Print from your Phone 
The KODAK STEP Printer connects wirelessly with Bluetooth, so there’s no computers needed. 
Print and Post 
KODAK STEP photos are sticky-backed, so you can post them on notebooks, laptops, and more. 
Plenty of Prints 
The powerful built-in battery supports up to 25 prints on a single charge. 
Next page
1 Portable Printing 2 Bluetooth Connectivity 3 Sticky-Backed Photos 4 Rechargeable Battery 
ZINK Zero Ink Technology 
Previous page
Instant Prints that Last 
No cumbersome cartridges required. Each sheet of 2x3ʺ sticky-backed photo paper is treated with a protective layer that shields it from tears, water damage, and smudges. 
Inkless Printing 
No need for ink, toner, or cartridges: ZINK paper is all you need. That’s because each sheet is embedded with color crystals that automatically activate every time you take a picture. 
Made in the USA 
The ZINK development and manufacturing facility is located in Whitsett, North Carolina. That’s where each sheet of ZINK paper is carefully created by American hands. 
Zink Paper Prints 
Enjoy vibrant full-color instant photos with a level of detail only possible through ZINK ZERO INK Technology. 
Next page
Start creating vibrant prints in four easy steps. 
Previous page
Step One 
Open paper tray. Insert KODAK ZINK Photo Paper. Ensure blue calibration sheet is at the bottom. 
Step Two 
Press and hold power button. The light will turn on, indicating the device is on. 
Step Three 
Download KODAK STEP PRINTS App from Google Play Store or Apple App Store. 
Step Four 
Use the app to personalize photos. Then tap the print button to watch your photos come to life! 
Next page
1 Load Paper 2 Power On 3 Download App 4 Edit + Print 
What makes the KODAK STEP unique? 
The KODAK STEP makes it possible to print any picture on your phone or social media account. Add a mountain of editing features, and this portable printer becomes a handheld print studio. 
Does the KODAK STEP come with KODAK ZINK paper? 
The KODAK STEP comes with a starter pack of ZINK paper, so you can start printing pictures right away. 
Is the KODAK STEP PRINTS App required in order to use this printer? 
Yes. The KODAK STEP PRINTS app must be installed on an Apple or Android device in order to edit and print photos. 
Can I print photos that are on my social media page? 
Yes. The KODAK STEP PRINTS app allows you to access photos from social media, so you can then edit, save, and print them. 
Do I need to replace the batteries? 
This printer comes equipped with a rechargeable battery, so there’s no need to replace it. The KODAK STEP Printer can print up 25 photos before it needs to be recharged with the included charging cable.

title: Liene 2x3” Photo Printer, Mini Photo Printer w/ 5 Zink Adhesive Photo Paper, Bluetooth 5.0, Compatible w/iOS & Android, Portable Color Mono Instant Photo Printer for iPhone, Smartphone, Pearl White
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
features: [No Ink, No Hassles] Inkless printing! It’s magic. Featuring Zink Zero Ink printing technology, Liene instant photo printer provides you with a unique digital experience, best-in-class image quality, and the instant-printing capabilities to capture everyday experiences and extend them into lasting memories! This photo printer for iphone comes w/ 5 extra photo papers. Liene mini photo printer addresses your preferences for mobility, convenience, immediacy, and quality!

[2x3 Sticky-Backed Photo Paper] The phone printer for iphone comes w/ 5 sheets of Zink colored paper, which is treated with a glossy, protective polymer overcoat that is water resistant, tear resistant, smudge proof, and dry to the touch. Thanks to its sticky-back, photos are also stickers, perfect for scrapbooking, decorating photo albums, laptops, and more. Peel off the adhesive backing and you can stick it anywhere. Photos printed by this printer for iphone will not fade even for 10 years! Get Liene portable photo printers now for yourself and your loved ones.

[Easy Printing via Bluetooth 5.0] Liene phone photo printer for smartphone enables fast printing by connecting to Bluetooth 5.0. A more stable signal and wider coverage will free you from worrying about printing without Wi-Fi when camping outdoors or on a road trip. Plus, the mini printer is compatible with iOS and Android devices. Slide the cover easily to load photo paper. Connect the Liene 2x3 photo printer and print unforgettable moments with a single click!

[Print Mono Photo Paper & Wireless Printing] Liene can print color and mono photos (you could buy extra mono papers), which is committed to transmitting more happiness and joy through photo sharing and has launched this phone printer. The lighter weight allows you to carry the picture printer for iphone in your bag to the party, which will not take up too much space or burden you. The photo printer for iphone w/ type-C charging port. 30 sheets of photo printings are available at one charge.

[New App function - Clean print head] Don't know what to do when there are white spots, white lines or other dirt on the photo when printing? The Liene phone printer has added a new feature (clean print head) to the photo app, which greatly solves the problem and gives you better photo quality. Note: A blue calibration card is required when cleaning the print head. See the videos on the product page for details. Note: Photos can only be printed through the Liene app.

title: HP Sprocket Photo Booth Machine Instant Color Photo Printer - 10.1" Touchscreen, LED Ring Light - Customize w/250+ Fun Frames, Prints on 3x4 Zink Paper or Share via QR Code, Mobile Notify App - White
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Lighting & Studio › Photo Studio › Posing Props
description: Take your next event to the next level with the HP Sprocket Photobooth! This one-of-a-kind photobooth device lets you instantly take and share fun, customized photos on 3x4” sticky-backed photo paper. Simply choose from the available categories to find the perfect layout for your event, select and customize your frames and filters and get the photobooth magic started! The 10.1” adjustable LCD touch screen offers a live view of your photos with layouts and filters applied, so you can make sure your photo looks just right before capturing the moment. And, with an LED ring light and flash built-in, you can confidently capture every detail in clear, bright color. When your photo is ready, sharing is easy. Simply hit print and watch as your photo instantly prints without the need for expensive ink or toners on ZINK paper. Your sticky-backed prints come out smudge-proof, water-resistant, and tear-resistant, so you can stick them anywhere and know they’ll last. Prefer digital copies? No problem. Connect to Wi-Fi and easily generate a QR code for fast and easy photo sharing and downloads. Snap, print, and share the instant photo fun!
features: PICTURE-PERFECT PRINTS Built-in flash and LED ring light make it easy to get that picture-perfect shot, every time. Select your layout, frame, and filters and get a live view of it all on the 10.1” LCD touch screen before hitting print.

YOUR PHOTO BOOTH, YOUR WAY Create a custom event in 3 simple steps, choose and customize frames & filters, and take control of guest privileges like max prints, photo sharing, restricted access, and more. Manage preferences for audio, brightness, screensavers and language! Great for event planners.

ZINK TECHNOLOGY Print photos on Zink sticky-backed paper and stick them to your scrapbook, bullet journal, photo wall, and more! Zink paper prints without the need for ink or toner, and has colors embedded inside for resistance to water, smudges, and tears. Stay on top of paper status in the app.

PORTABLE PHOTO FUN Weighing in at just over 8 pounds, it’s easy to bring the photobooth fun to any event and immediately make it the life of the party. With 250+ fun frames and stickers to choose from for every occasion, you’re sure to find the perfect ones to take any event to the next level.

SHARE IT YOUR WAY Print multiple copies of the same photo for fast and easy sharing with friends or generate a QR code when connected to Wi-Fi to download and share digital copies. Photos are automatically stored to the cloud, where they can be shared and managed at any time.

1 250+ Available Frames 2 Wi-Fi Sharing 3 Right Light and Flash 4 Companion App 5 Mounting Capabilities 
Previous page
Choose a Layout 
Select your event type from the available categories - wedding, graduation, holidays, and more. 
Personalize Event 
Choose your frames, customize your titles and captions, and pick a screensaver. 
Customize Settings 
Take control of the event. Set a print limit for guests, enable/disable photo sharing, and more. 
Smile + Share! 
Smile, snap, & share the love! Print and share instant photos or generate a QR code and go digital. 
Next page
1 Step One 2 Step Two 3 Step Three 4 Step Four 
Previous page
Your Photos, Your Way 
Choose from hundreds of available frames and filters on the device to unleash your creativity and give your pictures a personal touch. 
Long-Lasting Prints for Long-Lasting Fun 
Capture every moment on durable 3x4" Zero Ink paper - smudge-proof, water-resistant, tear-resistant, and built to last. 
Print Like a Pro 
For picture-perfect prints, insert 20 sheets (two packs of paper and cleaning sheets) at a time and make sure the barcode is facing left and glossy side is facing right. 
Stick to What You Love 
Peel off the adhesive backing and stick your favorite photo memories in your scrapbook, journal, laptop, and more. 
No Ink. No Hassles. No Compromises. 
Zink technology works like magic without the need for ink. Each sheet is embedded with heat-activated color crystals that bring bright, vibrant photos to life. 
Next page
How do I create an event? 
Creating an event is fast and easy. Simply choose and customize your layout from the available categories, select event settings like print limits and more, and get the party started. 
How do I take photos? 
Once you've set up an event, taking a photo is simple. Just choose your desired frame and filters, check out the live view on the screen to make sure everything looks good. Then, simply tap the camera icon, strike a pose, and let the countdown begin! 
How can I share photos? 
Share photos how you like. Digital photo sharing is made easy by generating a QR code via Wi-Fi that lets you download and share photos in a snap. Otherwise, you can print multiple physical copies at a time and share. 
What ZINK paper can I use? 
The HP Sprocket Photobooth is only compatible with HP 3x4 Zink photo paper, which is specially designed to work with your photobooth. Additional paper is available for purchase in the app or from other retailers. 
How do I connect to the HP Sprocket Photobooth app? 
First, connect to Wi-Fi and download the app from Google Play or the App Store on your Android or iOS device. Then, scan the QR code to pair your photobooth with the app and stay notified on paper jams, device status, and more.

Please do not hesitate to contact the Amazon customer support regarding your product and we will do everything we can to help you solve the issue.

title: KODAK Step Instant Smartphone Photo Printer - Portable Mini Color Wireless Mobile Printer - Zink 2x3” Sticky-Back Photos - Bluetooth Compatible with iOS & Android Devices - Fun Editing App - White
inStockText: In Stock  In stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
description: Whether you’re an avid traveler, social influencer, nostalgic scrapbooker or on-the-go photographer, one thing is certain—printing pictures takes too many steps! Now, with the KODAK step printer, printing full-color photographs is faster and easier than ever. Just pair with any Bluetooth- or NFC-enabled smart device, and stunning full-color photo prints are in your hand in under 60 seconds. Zink Zero Ink technology eliminates the need for expensive inks, toners and ribbons, delivering cool 2”x3” photographs you can peel and stick to any surface. Photos come out clear, bright, colorful and covered with an extra layer of protective coating to prevent smudges, rips and water damage. The KODAK app also lets you customize photos far beyond the usual ‘flip’ and ‘rotate’ of your smartphone. Use our extensive editing tools to apply flattering filters, cutesy stickers, decorative frames and other personalized flair. Note - *To ensure the best possible photo quality, make sure to properly insert the photo paper into the printer. Always load the blue Quality Card from the same pack of photo paper that is in the printer. The blue card should be inserted into the paper tray with the barcode facing down. If you use a blue card from other packs of paper, you might not get the best results. *If you are experiencing a paper jam, make sure to turn the printer off and on again. This should eject the paper out. Do not pull out the paper by hand. *Make sure not to cover the printing slot with your hand when the photo is printing.
features: STEP UP YOUR PRINTING GAME: No more making plans to print tomorrow. Kodak step printer connects to any iOS or Android Smartphone, Tablet or Similar Device [Via Bluetooth or NFC] so you can print pics instantly; Turn your selfies, portraits, social media posts & other images into physical photos.Package Includes : KODAK STEP Instant Mobile Photo Printer, Micro USB Charging Cable, Starter Pack of KODAK ZINK Photo Paper, Quick Start Guide, Limited Warranty

AMAZING ZERO-INK TECHNOLOGY: Zink innovation eliminates the need for pricy ink cartridges, toners or ribbons; 2” x 3” sticky-back paper with embedded dye crystals delivers high-quality, durable, affordable, beautifully detailed prints that are resistant to moisture, rips, tears & smudges

FULL EDITING SUITE VIA APP: Download the free Kodak App to create collages & customize your snaps with stunning filters, interesting borders, cool stickers, funny text & other personalized flair; Edit photos in your camera roll, then send to step for instant printing in less than 60 seconds

TAKE YOUR PROJECTS TO GO: Skip the computer connections, messy wires & clunky equipment; Our palm-sized printer weighs less than a pound, sets up fast & delivers gorgeous prints you can peel & stick everywhere; Great for decorating a fridge, laptop, locker, scrapbook, notebook & more

CUTE, COMPACT & COLORFUL: Step printer is designed for photo-loving influencers & crafters of all ages & skill levels; Portable, lightweight device features built-in lithium-ion rechargeable battery prints 25 photo on a full charge; Available in a variety of colors - a fantastic anytime gift idea
Max prints peed black white: 1.0 pages per minute
Max print speed color: 1.0 pages per minute
Printer technology: Zink technology
Package Includes : KODAK STEP Instant Mobile Photo Printer, Micro USB Charging Cable, Starter Pack of KODAK ZINK Photo Paper, Quick Start Guide, Limited Warranty

Previous page
Expert Editing 
The Kodak Step App provides more than the standard crop and rotate options. Get the picture-perfect print by adjusting brightness, color temperatures, blur settings, and more. 
Creative Collages 
Print up to four images on a single photo with the app’s collage mode. Momentous photo montages are just a moment away. 
Play with your Pics 
Add stickers, filters, and fun frames—even draw directly on your photos from the KODAK STEP PRINTS app!

Print from your Phone 
The KODAK STEP Printer connects wirelessly with Bluetooth, so there’s no computers needed. 
Print and Post 
KODAK STEP photos are sticky-backed, so you can post them on notebooks, laptops, and more. 
Plenty of Prints 
The powerful built-in battery supports up to 25 prints on a single charge. 
Next page
1 Portable Printing 2 Bluetooth Connectivity 3 Sticky-Backed Photos 4 Rechargeable Battery 
ZINK Zero Ink Technology 
Previous page
Instant Prints that Last 
No cumbersome cartridges required. Each sheet of 2x3ʺ sticky-backed photo paper is treated with a protective layer that shields it from tears, water damage, and smudges. 
Inkless Printing 
No need for ink, toner, or cartridges: ZINK paper is all you need. That’s because each sheet is embedded with color crystals that automatically activate every time you take a picture. 
Made in the USA 
The ZINK development and manufacturing facility is located in Whitsett, North Carolina. That’s where each sheet of ZINK paper is carefully created by American hands. 
Zink Paper Prints 
Enjoy vibrant full-color instant photos with a level of detail only possible through ZINK ZERO INK Technology. 
Next page
Start creating vibrant prints in four easy steps. 
Previous page
Step One 
Open paper tray. Insert KODAK ZINK Photo Paper. Ensure blue calibration sheet is at the bottom. 
Step Two 
Press and hold power button. The light will turn on, indicating the device is on. 
Step Three 
Download KODAK STEP PRINTS App from Google Play Store or Apple App Store. 
Step Four 
Use the app to personalize photos. Then tap the print button to watch your photos come to life! 
Next page
1 Load Paper 2 Power On 3 Download App 4 Edit + Print 
What makes the KODAK STEP unique? 
The KODAK STEP makes it possible to print any picture on your phone or social media account. Add a mountain of editing features, and this portable printer becomes a handheld print studio. 
Does the KODAK STEP come with KODAK ZINK paper? 
The KODAK STEP comes with a starter pack of ZINK paper, so you can start printing pictures right away. 
Is the KODAK STEP PRINTS App required in order to use this printer? 
Yes. The KODAK STEP PRINTS app must be installed on an Apple or Android device in order to edit and print photos. 
Can I print photos that are on my social media page? 
Yes. The KODAK STEP PRINTS app allows you to access photos from social media, so you can then edit, save, and print them. 
Do I need to replace the batteries? 
This printer comes equipped with a rechargeable battery, so there’s no need to replace it. The KODAK STEP Printer can print up 25 photos before it needs to be recharged with the included charging cable.

Official Kodak photo paper and cartridge (PHC-80) must be used for the Kodak Dock Plus photo printer, which can be found on Amazon. 
What's included in the package? 
- All products come with a photo printer with user manual, power adapter, iPhone Lightning adaptor, initial cartridge and 10 photo papers. 
- All bundles come with additional 80 sheets of photo paper and cartridge. 
What can you do with the Kodak Photo Printer App? 
With the free Kodak Photo Printer App, you can create frames and make many edits on your photos. 
How can I download Kodak Photo Printer app? 
Search and download 'Kodak Photo Printer' App on Google Play or App Store. 
What should I do if there is an issue with the product? 
Please do not hesitate to contact the Amazon customer support regarding your product and we will do everything we can to help you solve the issue.

title: Canon SELPHY CP1500 Compact Photo Printer, Portable Photo Printer, Instant Photo Printer, Mobile Friendly, AirPrint, Black
inStockText: Usually ships within 1 to 2 months  Usually ships within 1 to 2 months
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
description: Introducing the SELPHY CP1500 wireless compact photo printer, the perfect portable photo printer for printing at home and on the go. Easily print with AirPrint1, WiFi2, the SELPHY Layout app or the Canon PRINT app3, your camera memory card4,or USB so your memories are ready to share wherever you are! Choose the right size for the right photo -from 4”x6”, 2.1”x 2.1” square to mini label stickers, all made to last up to 100 years5 and are even water resistant! Take the SELPHY CP1500 almost anywhere with the optional battery pack.
features: The sleek and modern design of the SELPHY CP1500 is reflected in how easy it is to use even with powerful features such as Wi-Fi and smartphone connectivity.
Thanks to a small footprint, the SELPHY CP1500 is incredibly portable, and with an optional battery back, you can print and share your memories from just about anyplace that you go.
Not only will your photos look great, they will also be instantly dry and water resistant, and continue to look great for up to 100 years. (5)

Enjoy the flexibility of Wi-Fi, USB, and memory card connections for your SELPHY CP1500 to connect to just about anything and print from devices like your smartphone to your computer, camera, memory cards, and even USB flash drives.
A large built-in 3.5” display allows you to view, edit, and add filter effects like sepia, or B/W to the images you want to print.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Previous page
Quality You Can Count On 
Delivers vibrant, professional-grade prints with sharp details, lasting up to 100 years (3). 
Instantly Dry & Marker Ready 
Images print dry & ready to handle, perfect for adding a personal touch with markers on your photo! 
Choose From 3 Finishing Options! 
Prints glossy, semi-gloss and satin finishes, and even prints patterns for a pop of texture! 
Next page
1 Quality 2 Print Ready 3 Print Options 
Previous page
Choose the Best Size for Your Photo 
Print classic 4"x6" snapshots, trendy 2.1"x2.1" square photos, or adorable mini label stickers. 
Ready for Travel 
Print your passport photo instantly and get ready for your next adventure! 
Create & Craft with the SELPHY CP1500 
Design albums, scrapbooks, and decor with vibrant prints that bring your memories to life! 
Next page
1 Print Sizes 2 Travel Ready 3 Design 
WiFi, USB, & More, Oh My! 
Print your favorite moments effortlessly using WiFi (1), AirPrint (5), USB (computer and USB flash drive), your camera’s memory card (4), or the SELPHY Photo Layout smartphone app (2). Choose the method that fits your style and start printing! 
Print, Edit & Add Effects from Your Smartphone 
Now updated to V3.0, the SELPHY Photo Layout app (1) lets you create collages, choose which images you want to use for mini-stickers, add pattern overcoat effects, and even add QR codes to your prints to direct someone to a specific webpage! 
On-the-Go Printing 
Where's the best place to print images? Anywhere you are! With the optional NB-CP2LH battery producing up to 54 prints per charge, you can take your SELPHY CP1500 just about anywhere! 
Disclaimers 
(1) Wireless printing requires a working network with wireless 802.11b/g 2.4ghz compatibility. Wireless performance may vary based on terrain and distance between the printer and wireless network clients. 
(2) Requires an Internet connection and the Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY app or SELPHY Layout app, available for free on the App Store and at Google Play. Your device must be connected to the same working network with wireless 802.11 b/g capability as your printer. 
(3) Based on accelerated testing by Canon in dark storage under controlled temperature, humidity and gas conditions, simulating storage in an album with plastic sleeves. Canon cannot promise the longevity of prints; results may vary depending on printed image, display/storage conditions, and environmental factors. 
(4) Compatible memory cards include SD Card, SDHC Card. The following can be used with the addition of a special adapter sold separately: miniSD Card, miniSDHC Card, microSD Card, microSDHC Card, microSDXC Card. 
(5) AirPrint functionality requires an iPad, iPhone 3GS or later, or iPod touch 3rd generation or later device running iOS 4.2 or later, and an AirPrint-enabled printer connected to the same network as your iOS device. A printer connected to the USB port of your Mac, PC, AirPort Base station, or Time Capsule is not supported.

Is the printer easy to use from installation to use? 
This photo printer is easy to use in 3 steps: 
1. Install the ink cartridge and photo paper. 
2. Connect the power cord and turn it on. 
3. Print via the app or directly from the photo album. 
Can I still use it If I don't have Wi-Fi at home? 
Yes, you can. The Liene photo printer has a built-in hotspot and also supports a USB connection. You can connect your device via the printer’s hotspot. 
Does the photo printer come with photo paper at the time of purchase? Need to buy additional photo paper separately? 
The Liene photo printer set comes with 1 ink cartridge and 20 sheets of photo paper. Our store also sells photo paper sets that include with 1 ink cartridge and 40 sheets of photo paper. And a set of 2 ink cartridges and 80 sheets. 
What if I don't want to use the app to print photos? 
You can print photos directly from your iPhone or Android phone's local photo album. Plus, you can print photos from a Mac or Windows-based laptop or desktop via Wi-Fi or USB.

title: Kodak Dock & Wi-Fi Portable 4x6” Instant Photo Printer, Premium Quality Full Color Prints - Compatible w/iOS & Android Devices
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Photo Printers
description: Just press the button, and prepare to be amazed! Have you put off printing those hundreds of photos stuck in your cellphone? With the Photo Printer Dock PD-450 by Kodak, you can create beautiful 4x6 prints with the simple press of a button. This innovative dock is a charger and printer in one, letting you power your various devices while bringing every snapshot to bold, vivid life. Easy print technology means you will not need to transfer files to a computer or memory card. Just plug in your Android phone via the 5-pin dock, or hook up your iOS device with the lightning charger. Press One Touch, and watch the Kodak app launch, and print a standard sized print in an instant. This smart gadget is also fully compatible with your devices via the built in Wi-Fi network. It Also allows direct printing from your digital camera with PictBridge technology. No SD Card Slots.You will also love adorning your pics with the app free editing features, including tons of filters, stickers, card templates, and beyond. With this cool, compact, printing your camera roll is fun again!What You Get 1 KODAK Photo Printer Dock 1 iOS adapter 1 power adapter Manual 10 Photo Cartridge and Paper PackSpecs Photo 4x6 inches Unit measures 165.8 x 100 x 68.5mm Weighs in at 760g Main connection: 5-pin micro USB Input: USB host Supporting file: JPEG Printing method: Dye sublimation thermal transfer Gradation: 256 Gradations/16.7 million colorsCompatible Ink Cartridges: PHC-40, 80, 120 We recommend to use the printer only with supplied power adapters (Power 24V 2.5A).App available via Google Play and App Store Kodak Dock Firmware update require before first use. AirPrint-compatible for IOS devices.CARTRIDGE REPLACEMENTEasy maintenance. Simple cartridge refills are effortless to remove & replace; Pull with two fingers to eject, then insert new cartridge to resume printing.
features: ONE TOUCH PRINTING: Convenient printer dock lets you print photos direct from your smartphone; includes android dock pin & free iOS lightning adapter
HIGH QUALITY PHOTOS – Fast, Easy System Prints Standard 4” x 6” Photos in Brilliant Color & Stunning Detail; D2T2 Thermal Transfer Technology Won’t Bleed or Fade

MAXIMUM DEVICE COMPATIBILITY: Dock features 5 pin micro USB for Android & USB host for printing from iPhone, iPad, Digital Camera, or USB memory stick; We recommend to use the printer only with supplied power adapters (Power 24V 2.5A)
SIMULTANEOUS CHARGING: Power Up to Two Smart Devices While You Wait; Unique Dock Supplies a Fast Charge for Home, Office, School, or Business
COMPANION APP: Download the Kodak Photo Printer App for Filters, Stickers, Card Templates, Collage Maker, Video & SNS Print - AirPrint compatible for IOS devices.

description: Let the good times print with the HP Sprocket Portable Photo Printer. With exclusive editing features, seamless social media integration, and easy party printing mode, creating gorgeous full-color photographs is as simple as showing up. Send images straight from your smartphone to the HP app to customize, print, share with friends, and stick to your scrapbook, journal, collage, photo wall, and other creative projects. Zink Zero Ink premium paper resists smudging, tearing, and fading, while upgraded Bluetooth 5.0 allows everyone to join in the action. In addition to customizing and printing photos straight from your smartphone or social media account via the HP Sprocket app, friends can also connect. Specs & Details - Compatibility: iOS & Android - Wireless: Bluetooth 5.0 - Print Type: ZINK Zero Ink - Warranty: 1-year limited

Making Moments to Remember 
Previous page
Create Picture-perfect Photos 
Print out several full-color 2” x 3” photos on a single charge with this rechargeable printer.

Open up the compatible app and add borders, stickers, text, and more to pictures before you print

1 Stunning Quality 2 Photo Editing 3 Print Anywhere 4 Print and Share 
Perfection in One Compact Printer 
Previous page
Wireless Printing 
Printing Made Easy. Create beautiful 2x3” prints instantly right from your smartphone via Bluetooth 
Invite and share 
One for All. Connect multiple users and invite your friends to print with personalized LED lights to distinguish each user 
Easy Setup 
Start Printing Quick. Open the printer, load the paper, and power on the device. Now you’re ready to print hundreds of beautiful photos 
Next page
ZINK ZERO INK Technology 
Previous page
Resistant and Resilient 
Print your happy memories on tear-resistant, smudge-proof & waterproof paper that will last for years to come 
Timeless Technology 
Zink technology works like magic. With embedded crystals aligned in each sheet of paper, bright, vibrant pictures appear on paper with evenly distributed heating 
Ink-free Operation 
Don’t worry about having to reload your printer with more ink cartridges or ribbons. ZINK Photo Paper works without the need for ink 
Stick with Quality 
Decorate your room, books, laptop, and more with sticky-backed photos of smiling faces and happy memories 
Next page
What makes the HP Sprocket 2x3 printer unique? 
The HP Sprocket 2x3 printer is a sleek, compact, lightweight printer that saves power with sleep mode and utilizes personalized lights when multiple users are connected to it. 
Where can I get the HP Sprocket app and what does it do? 
You can download the app from Google Play or the App Store on your Android or iOS device. With this photo-editing app, you can change photo filters, personalize your pictures, and print from your mobile device. 
How do I perform the Bluetooth pairing for my printer? 
First, download the HP Sprocket app and make sure Bluetooth is activated on your mobile device. Next, go into the app and select the printer you wish to add to the printer list. Then, wait for the printer and your mobile device to connect 
Do I need to replace the batteries? 
No, you do not need to replace the batteries in the printer. The HP Sprocket 2x3 printer is rechargeable. Plug in the device with the included USB cable to charge it. Once it is charged, you can print out 35 photos in a single charge 
What is HP Sprocket Zink 2” x 3” sticky-backed paper? 
HP Sprocket Zink 2” x 3” sticky-backed paper is 2” x 3” sized photo paper that doesn’t need ink, toners, or cartridges and can be placed anywhere with its adhesive backing.

description: The PIXMA G3202 Wireless MegaTank All-In-One Printer delivers high-quality, low-cost printing, and wireless connectivity in a compact size. Get serious print productivity with a high page yield of up to 6,000 Black / 7,000 Color pages per full ink bottle set (1) and a low cost per print - that’s about 30 times (2) as many prints as you can get from conventional ink cartridge sets! The PIXMA G3202 comes with a full set of ink, so you can print with confidence. The PIXMA G3202 is easy to set up and maintain and offers great media versatility to print on a variety of media types and sizes, including photo paper, envelopes, banners and more. Use Poster Artist Online (3) to create professional-posters, banners and signage. Print both documents and photos on a variety of paper types using a hybrid quality 4-color pigment-based ink system with pigment black for sharp black text and dye-based colors for vivid borderless (4) photos up to 8.5” x 11”. Keep printing with a plain paper capacity of up to 100 sheets or 20 photo sheets (4”x6”). Easily connect and print through high-speed USB or wirelessly (5) from computers or mobile devices. This comes with a 1-year limited warranty (6) and is backed by Canon's Service and Support network.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer

What is a Megatank? 
· An inkjet printer that uses a continuous ink supply system to deliver sustainable, high quality, cost-effective prints. 
· Design to last as long as 30 conventional ink cartridge sets.(2) 
· Can print up to 6,000 x 3 crisp black pages / 7,000 magnificent color pages.(1) 
RETHINK THE WAY YOU PRINT WITH CONTINUOUS INK 
Wireless - Print l Copy l Scan 
Introducing the Canon PIXMA G3200/G3202 Wireless MegaTank All-In-One Printer–the perfect printer for people who print a lot and copy a lot. The MegaTank ink reservoir system allows it to print up to 6,000 crisp black pages / 7,000 magnificent color pages(1) from one set of replacement inks bottles. Plus, you can print on the go with your compatible mobile device. 
Integrated Ink Tanks 
Print cartridge free and easily keep tabs on ink levels with front mounted reservoirs. 
Cost-Effective Printing 
Print up to 6,000 crisp black pages / 7,000 magnificent color pages(1). That’s equivalent to 30 standard ink cartridges!(2) 
Easy-To-Refill 
Be mess free with the Megatank’s ink bottles. Simply screw off the cap and squeeze the bottle to pour the ink into the tank. 
Document & Borderless Photo Printing 
Enjoy the increase in print volume without sacrificing high-quality document & borderless photo prints. Print text-heavy documents to family photos using rich sharp blacks and bright, vivid colors. 
Sharp Black Text 
Print detailed documents with Sharp Black Text from the pigment black ink. 
Borderless Photos 
Print beautiful Borderless Photos(6) in (4”x6”, 5”x5”, 5”x7”, 8”x10”, 8.5”x11”) 
Print on-the-go 
Print using the Canon PRINT app and more. 
Built in Wi-Fi(R) 
Print from any room in the house with Built In WI-FI(3). 
1. Page yield of included ink bottles used for initial setup is lower than the replacement ink bottles, as a certain amount of ink is consumed to fill into the print head during the setup (charging the print head initially). Page yield is the estimated value based on Canon individual test method using the ISO/IEC 24712 chart and continuous printing simulation with the replacement ink bottles after initial setup. Page yield of color inks is an average yield of cyan, magenta and yellow inks combined. Page yield varies significantly depending on content printed and other factors. Up to 6,000 (black) / 7,000 (color) printed page yields are approximate, based off document pages printed. 
2. 30 ink cartridge sets is based on print yield of the included black and color ink bottles as compared to the following standard-capacity cartridge sets: PG-245 Black Ink Cartridge and CL-246 Color Ink Cartridge as of August 2016. 
3. Wireless printing and scanning requires a working network with wireless 802.11b/g or n capability. Wireless performance may vary based on terrain and distance between the printer and wireless network clients. 
4. Requires an Internet Connection. 
5. Requires an Internet connection and the Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY app, available for free on the App Store and at Google Play. Compatible with iPad, iPhone 3GS or later, and iPod touch 3rd generation or later devices running iOS 7.0 or later, and AndroidTM mobile devices running Android 2.3.3 or later. Your device must be connected to the same working network with wireless 802.11 b/g/n capability as your printer. Requires an compatible social media account and is subject to that social media account’s Terms of Service. Certain exceptions may apply. 
6. Requires an Internet connection and Google account. Subject to Google Terms of Service. Certain exceptions may apply. 
7. AirPrint functionality requires an iPad, iPhone 3GS or later, or iPod touch 3rd generation or later device running iOS 4.2 or later, and an AirPrint-enabled printer connected to the same network as your iOS device. 
8. Requires AndroidTM mobile device with AndroidTM 4.4 operating system or later with the Mopria Print Service pre-loaded with that device and the compatible PIXMA printer on the same wireless network. The Mopria experience is also available on AndroidTM 4.4 mobile devices with a download of the Mopria Print Service from Google Play. 
9. Document print speeds are the averages of ESAT in Office Category Test for the default simplex mode, ISO/IEC 24734. Photo print speed is based on the default setting using ISO/JIS-SCID N2 on Photo Paper Plus Glossy II and does not take into account data processing time on host computer. Print speed may vary depending on system configuration, interface, software, document complexity, print mode, page coverage, type of paper used etc. Copy speeds are the average of sFCOT and sESAT, ISO/IEC 29183. Copy speed may vary depending on document complexity, copy mode, page coverage, type of paper used etc. and does not take into account warming up time. See the Canon website for additional details.

modules.text:
1. Page yield of included ink bottles used for initial setup is lower than the replacement ink bottles, as a certain amount of ink is consumed to fill into the print head during the setup (charging the print head initially). Page yield is the estimated value based on Canon individual test method using the ISO/IEC 24712 chart and continuous printing simulation with the replacement ink bottles after initial setup. Page yield of color inks is an average yield of cyan, magenta and yellow inks combined. Page yield varies significantly depending on content printed and other factors. Up to 6,000 (black) / 7,000 (color) printed page yields are approximate, based off document pages printed. 
2. 30 ink cartridge sets is based on print yield of the included black and color ink bottles as compared to the following standard-capacity cartridge sets: PG-245 Black Ink Cartridge and CL-246 Color Ink Cartridge as of August 2016. 
3. Wireless printing and scanning requires a working network with wireless 802.11b/g or n capability. Wireless performance may vary based on terrain and distance between the printer and wireless network clients. 
4. Requires an Internet Connection. 
5. Requires an Internet connection and the Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY app, available for free on the App Store and at Google Play. Compatible with iPad, iPhone 3GS or later, and iPod touch 3rd generation or later devices running iOS 7.0 or later, and AndroidTM mobile devices running Android 2.3.3 or later. Your device must be connected to the same working network with wireless 802.11 b/g/n capability as your printer. Requires an compatible social media account and is subject to that social media account’s Terms of Service. Certain exceptions may apply. 
6. Requires an Internet connection and Google account. Subject to Google Terms of Service. Certain exceptions may apply. 
7. AirPrint functionality requires an iPad, iPhone 3GS or later, or iPod touch 3rd generation or later device running iOS 4.2 or later, and an AirPrint-enabled printer connected to the same network as your iOS device. 
8. Requires AndroidTM mobile device with AndroidTM 4.4 operating system or later with the Mopria Print Service pre-loaded with that device and the compatible PIXMA printer on the same wireless network. The Mopria experience is also available on AndroidTM 4.4 mobile devices with a download of the Mopria Print Service from Google Play. 
9. Document print speeds are the averages of ESAT in Office Category Test for the default simplex mode, ISO/IEC 24734. Photo print speed is based on the default setting using ISO/JIS-SCID N2 on Photo Paper Plus Glossy II and does not take into account data processing time on host computer. Print speed may vary depending on system configuration, interface, software, document complexity, print mode, page coverage, type of paper used etc. Copy speeds are the average of sFCOT and sESAT, ISO/IEC 29183. Copy speed may vary depending on document complexity, copy mode, page coverage, type of paper used etc. and does not take into account warming up time. See the Canon website for additional details.

description: Kiipix smartphone picture printer is the easy and portable way to let the fun last forever. Making real memories with real pictures has never been easier than with the KiiPix photo printer. Open up your Kiipix, place your phone on top, push the button and turn the crank. Kiipix puts you in control. Unlike a traditional instant camera that often wastes film for blurry pictures, you can enhance the contrast or play with filter options before your photo prints. From fixing that annoying red eye to adding bunny ears or other fun filters, Kiipix portable photo printer lets you augment your own reality and then print it out to share with the real world. Photo Size: 3. 4 inch x 2. 1 inch and Image Size: 2. 4 inch x 1. 8 inch
features: EASY TO USE SMARTPHONE PRINTER: Instantly print favorite photos from your smartphone! Place film, place phone, and print!
PORTABLE PHOTO PRINTER: Compact and folds flat for easy travel; No batteries or cords required
PHOTO SCANNER: Add fun filters or just get rid of the red-eye and then use KiiPix photo printer to scan those photos from your phone’s screen right to the film
NO INSTANT CAMERA NEEDED: The KiiPix only requires FUJIFILM Instax mini film (sold separately) and your phone to provide you with fun prints

THE BEST PICTURES: For the best pictures, make sure your screen lock is on and that you turn the phone’s brightness all the way up, also provides perfect pictures for wallets, Photo Size: 3. 4 inch x 2. 1 inch and Image Size: 2. 4 inch x 1. 8 inch

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Get the Best Pics 
For the best results, make sure your screen lock is on and that you turn your phone’s brightness all the way up. Align the KiiPix frame to your phone and then place on top of KiiPix. Use the reflective mirror to make sure the photo is lined up the way you want it. 
Get Personal 
Share favorite moments with friends by creating a personalized card or gift with KiiPix prints. Whether it’s a special birthday card or a creative collage, KiiPix lets you make unique pieces that friends will be able to treasure long after their special day. 
Take it Anywhere 
No batteries to replace and no cords to plug in. Add in the compact fold, and KiiPix is an easy travel companion that lets you create in-the-moment souvenirs on all your adventures.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the printer easy to use and fun to use. They appreciate its simple setup and analog design. However, some customers have reported issues with picture quality, functionality, and quality. The pictures come out a bit dark or white, and some photos turn out weird. There are also complaints about defective units, the shutter not working properly, and poor reliability. Lines are also disliked. Opinions differ on value for money.

description: The EcoTank Photo ET-8500 wireless all-in-one prints lab-quality color photos, graphics and everyday documents — all at an incredible value. Epson’s cartridge-free, 6-color Claria ET Premium Ink system delivers vibrant colors and sharp text for all your creative projects. With low-cost replacement ink bottles, print 4" x 6" photos for about 4 cents each compared to 40 cents with cartridges (1). Print everything from borderless 8.5" x 11" photos to customized CDs/DVDs. You can even print on cardstock and other media up to 1.3 mm thick. For added convenience, each set of bottles lets you print for up to 2 years (2). Plus, save up to 80 percent with replacement ink bottles vs. ink cartridges (3) — that’s about $2,000 on each set (3). The EcoTank Photo lets you do it all with affordable in-house printing. 1. Actual savings and costs will vary considerably based on print tasks, print volumes and usage conditions. Savings and cost per ISO 29103 page are based on the cost of replacement ink bottles and the cost of enough standard cartridges to achieve the total page yields of the bottles using the MSRP (USD) and yields for Epson standard-capacity ink cartridges for similarly featured Epson consumer inkjet printers as of June 2020. 2. Based on average monthly document print volumes of about 200 pages. 3. Actual savings and costs will vary considerably based on print tasks, print volumes and usage conditions. Color photo in Draft Mode on Premium Photo Paper Glossy measured from start of paper feed. Actual print times will vary based on factors including system configuration, software, and page complexity. For more information. 5. Replacement ink bottle yields based on the ISO/IEC 24712 pattern with Epson’s methodology. Replacement ink bottle photo yields are significantly lower and are based on the ISO/IEC 29103 pattern with Epson’s methodology. Actual ink yields will vary considerably for reasons including images printed, print settings, temperature and humidity. Yields may be lower when printing infrequently or predominantly with one ink color. All ink colors are used for printing and printer maintenance, and all colors must be available for printing. For more information. 6. Individual cartridges estimate based on print yields of a replacement set of Black and color ink bottles as compared to Epson standard-capacity ink cartridges for similarly featured Epson consumer inkjet printers as of June 2020. 7. Most features require an Internet connection to the printer, as well as an Internet- and/or email-enabled device. For a list of Epson Connect enabled printers and compatible devices and apps. 8. Epson Smart Panel App download required. Data usage fees may apply. 9. Epson Connect account and voice-activated account registration required. For an additional 12-month extended service plan (total of 24 months or 50,000 plain paper sheets, whichever happens first), register your product and use Epson genuine ink bottles. See Limited Warranty for details. 11. For convenient and reasonable recycling options. 12. description: An entire photo studio that fits on your desktop! The HP Sprocket Studio Plus brings memories to life easier than ever before This desktop wonder saves you a lifetime of memories (and money), printing full 4x6” color photographs straight from your smartphone or social media account. Create vibrant photo projects, albums, collages, greeting cards —even photo IDs— with tons of customization options on the HP Sprocket app. Friends can also connect for simultaneous printing, adding another layer of fun to your next party, birthday, or family get-together. With HP, it’s always a journey in creativity. Specs & Details - Dimensions: 6.65” x 10.75” x 2.68” - Photo Size: 4” x 6” - Compatibility: iOS & Android - Wireless: Bluetooth 5.0 - Print Type: Dye sublimation technology [cartridge required] - Warranty: 1-year limited.

COOL FILTERS, FRAMES & STICKERS - Customize Your Prints with Editing Tools on the HP App. Augmented Reality Fun & Templates for Albums, Greeting Cards, Photo IDs & Collages.

Stunning Pictures 
Watch as this quality device prints out colorful, clear 4” x 6” photos for you to share with others. 
Photo-editing app 
Stylize your photos on the user-friendly HP Sprocket app so you can make your pictures really pop. 
Wi-Fi enabled 
Easily connect your printer via Wi-Fi and print memorable photos from your smartphone. 
Simple operation 
Load in an ink cartridge and a stack of paper in seconds then you’re ready to print. 
Long-lasting prints

Next page
PHOTOS MADE TO LAST 
Previous page
Bigger Photos 
Life is filled with wonderful events, unexpected moments, and loving memories so print it all on 4” x 6” paper that is big enough to hold it. 
Durable Paper 
Keep memories forever when they are printed on blot-proof, smudge-proof & tear-resistant paper. 
Dye Sublimation Printing 
Create fade-free prints with quality color using dye sublimation technology. 
Instant Prints 
Travel around the world for the most amazing sights and print them out as beautiful photos just as fast as you capture them. 
Next page
4x6” PHOTOS IN AN INSTANT 
Previous page
Step One 
Open the paper tray and insert photo paper into the paper compartment. 
Step Two 
Open the side compartment of the printer and push the ink cartridge inside until a click is heard. 
Step Three 
Press and hold the power button on the printer. 
Step Four 
Download the HP Sprocket app from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store on your smart device. 
Step Five 
Use the app to personalize your photo. Then, print your picture or share it on social media. 
Next page
1 Load Paper 2 Install Cartridge 3 Power On 4 Download App 5 Edit, Print, Share 
What makes the HP Sprocket Studio Plus printer unique? 
The HP Sprocket Studio Plus printer uses 4x6” photo paper. It uses dye sublimation technology to print the brightest, clearest images in one smooth process. 
How do you connect the printer to the app? 
The HP Sprocket Studio Plus is a Wi-Fi printer. You can pair your smartphone with the printer via Wi-Fi in order to use the HP Sprocket app. 
What can you do with the HP Sprocket app? 
Once the printer is connected to the app, you can use the app to enhance your photos. Add stickers, text, borders, and more to your pictures. Take multiple creative photos together with the phot booth feature. 
What HP photo paper and cartridges are compatible with this printer? 
The pack known as the HP Sprocket Studio Plus 4 x 6 Photo Paper and Cartridge bundle is the only bundle compatible with the HP Sprocket Studio Plus printer. This pack comes with 108 sheets and 2 cartridges. 
Does this printer have a rechargeable battery? 
The HP Sprocket Studio Plus does not come with a rechargeable battery. In order to power the printer, connect the printer to the power source using the AC adapter.

items.name: What makes the HP Sprocket Studio Plus printer unique?
items.text: The HP Sprocket Studio Plus printer uses 4x6” photo paper. It uses dye sublimation technology to print the brightest, clearest images in one smooth process.

items.name: How do you connect the printer to the app?
items.text: The HP Sprocket Studio Plus is a Wi-Fi printer. You can pair your smartphone with the printer via Wi-Fi in order to use the HP Sprocket app.

items.name: What can you do with the HP Sprocket app?
items.text: Once the printer is connected to the app, you can use the app to enhance your photos. Add stickers, text, borders, and more to your pictures. Take multiple creative photos together with the phot booth feature.

items.name: What HP photo paper and cartridges are compatible with this printer?
items.text: The pack known as the HP Sprocket Studio Plus 4 x 6 Photo Paper and Cartridge bundle is the only bundle compatible with the HP Sprocket Studio Plus printer. This pack comes with 108 sheets and 2 cartridges.

items.name: Does this printer have a rechargeable battery?
items.text: The HP Sprocket Studio Plus does not come with a rechargeable battery. In order to power the printer, connect the printer to the power source using the AC adapter.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the printer easy to use and producing nice pictures. They appreciate its portability and quality. However, some have issues with the size and connectivity.

description: Printing stunning, eye-catching photos is easy and efficient with the Kodak Step Slim photo printer. Enjoy creating prints with a super thin, palm-sized photo printer. The design of this instant printer is both trendy and compact making it a great companion for photographers, students, tourists, and anyone else that like taking photos on the go. Capture beautiful moments, jaw-dropping scenery, and epic memories then print them on water-resistant, smudge-proof, and tear-resistant paper so you have them for years to come.
features: SLEEK. STYLISH. SLIM – Print beautiful, vibrant photos with a thin, compact printer. The glossy, fashionable design is guaranteed to be a fabulous tool for influencers, photographers, and scrapbookers.

TAKE PHOTOS ON THE GO - Travel to all your favorite places with a lightweight, pocket-sized printer and create prints in under a minute. Don’t worry about messy wiring, computer connection, or bulky equipment, simply print photos anywhere and everywhere with ease.

SHAKE THINGS UP – Connect this printer to the KODAK STEP Prints app on your smartphone. Then, personalize your photos on the free editing app so your pictures really pop. Add frames, stickers, and so much more.
THINK ZERO INK – Print gorgeous, colorful 2” x 3” pictures on Zink ink-free paper. Enjoy developing dry-to-the-touch, quality photos without the need of ink or toners.

SHARE YOUR STYLE – Put your customizable photos on social media for your friends and family to enjoy. Or print your memorable photos and place them on your walls, locker, laptop and more using the sticky backing.

productOverview.value: Kodak Step Slim Instant Mobile Photo Printer

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Kodak Step Slim Photo Printer 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Making photo-printing easy and convenient. 
Previous page
A Hot New Look 
Show off the sleek, shiny design of the KODAK STEP Slim Printer to friends and family. 
Anytime, Anywhere 
Take the KODAK STEP Slim Printer with you so you are ready to print on vacation or family outings. 
Modernize How You Print 
Connect the KODAK STEP Slim Printer to your smartphone via Bluetooth for swift, simple printing. 
Decorate your World 
Stick your adhesive-backed photos to your walls, locker, bag, notebooks and other belongings. 
Charge Up Again and Again 
Print 25 photos in a single charge then charge up the built-in battery for more photo printing. 
Next page
1 Slim Design 2 Portable Printing 3 Bluetooth Connectivity 4 Sticky-backed Photos 5 Rechargeable Battery 
Kodak Step Prints App 
Previous page
Supports Kodak Sticker Photo Paper 
This user-friendly app was made to accommodate Kodak 2x3 Pre-cut too. With a simple setting change, you can print out two stickers per print using a 30 pack of Kodak Pre-cut Sticker Photo Paper. 
Expert Editing 
With the KODAK STEP Prints app, you can do more than standard editing. Make your photos really shine by adjusting the brightness, color, blur, and so much more. 
Collage 
The only thing better than one vibrant photo is four in one. Use the KODAK STEP Prints app to turn four standout photos into one gorgeous collage. 
Stickers & Filters 
Add a fun new element to your photo with the KODAK STEP Prints app’s incredible customization. With tons of stickers, frames, and filters at your disposal, you can really make each photo your own. 
Next page
ZINK Zero Ink Technology 
Previous page
Long-lasting Prints 
Print your happy memories on tear-resistant, smudge-proof & waterproof paper that will last for years to come. 
Inkless Printing 
Don’t worry about have to reload your printer with more ink cartridges or ribbons. ZINK Photo Paper works without the need for ink. 
Made in the US 
Quality, reliable paper you can trust made right here in America. The ZINK development and manufacturing facility is located in Whitsett, North Carolina. 
Detailed Photos 
See the big, bright smiles of family and friends on paper that brings out crisp details and vibrant colors in every print. 
Next page
Start creating vibrant prints in four easy steps. 
Previous page
Step One 
Remove cover and insert KODAK ZINK Photo Paper. Blue sheet should be bottom of the paper stack. 
Step Two 
Download the KODAK STEP Prints app from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store. 
Step Three 
Use the photo-editing app to customize your photo. Then watch a beautiful photo print. 
Step Four 
Keep your personalized photos on your smartphone and share your pictures on social media. 
Next page
1 Load Paper 2 Download App 3 Edit + Print 4 Share 
What makes the KODAK STEP Slim printer unique? 
The KODAK STEP Slim printer is the slim and sleek version of the KODAK STEP printer. It’s compact design and trimmed down look is sure to be something you’ll love. 
Is the Kodak Step Prints app required to use this printer? 
Yes, the app is required. You can download the app from Google Play or the App Store on your Android or iOS device. 
How do I perform the Bluetooth pairing for my printer? 
First, press and hold the power button on the printer. Next, open the Bluetooth settings on your phone. Finally, select the KODAK STEP Slim printer when it appears on the Bluetooth list. 
Do I need to replace the batteries? 
No, you do not need to replace the batteries in the printer. The KODAK STEP Slim printer is rechargeable. Plug in the device with a micro-USB cable to charge it. Once it is charged, you can print out 25 photos in a single charge. 
What is KODAK ZINK 2” x 3” sticky-backed paper? 
KODAK ZINK 2” x 3” sticky-backed paper is 2” x 3” sized photo paper that doesn’t need ink, toners, or cartridges and can be place anywhere with its adhesive backing.

Creating The Largest Prints In The Instax Product Line-Up, This Wide-Format Smartphone Printer Is Overflowing With ‘Must-Have’ Features To Make Sure Nothing Is Lost. After All, The ‘Fullness’ Of Every Moment Should Be Captured For All To See. That’S Why We Say ‘Print It Wide’. Not Only Does The Instax Link Wide Printer Let You Get Everyone In The Photo, But The Free Instax Link Wide Downloadable App Also Adds A Whole Other Dimension. Connect Your Smartphone To The Printer Wirelessly Via Bluetooth, And You’Re Able To Add Text To Your Photos, Resize, Apply A Filter, Play With The Contrast - The Options Are Endless. You Can Choose Between Two Image Color Modes – Instax-Rich Mode For Rich Colors And Instax-Natural Mode For A Natural Image Quality. Apply A Qr Code To Your Photo To Link To A Url, Hear Sounds You Recorded And View Secret Messages And Locations – Just By Scanning The Qr Code With Your Smartphone. And That’S Not All! Also, Choose From Over 1,600 “Stickers” In The App To Apply To Your Photo! Available In Ash White And Mocha Gray. Live Life Wide.
