title: Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 2 Instant Smartphone Printer (Clay White) and Fujifilm Instax Mini Twin Film Pack (40 Exposures) Bundle
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
description: Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 2 Instant Smartphone PrinterThe Instax Mini Link 2 Smartphone Printer connects wirelessly in a simple, yet super fun way. Connect to your Smartphone via the free downloadable Instax Mini Link App and watch the creativity flow with the all-new InstaxAiR feature. Add bubbles, petals, neon, spray paint, or even glitter to your shot by drawing in the air with the Mini Link 2 Printer, all before printing out onto Instax Mini instant film. You can even record a video of the drawing and share the moment as a printable QR code, ready to scan with a Smartphone. Available in Soft Pink, Clay White or Space Blue, this compact, lightweight Mini Link 2 Smartphone Printer is so much fun. Keep on moving with your Mini Link 2 Smartphone Printer. Want to control your Smartphone Camera with your Mini Link 2 Printer? Power up Instax Camera Mode in the App. Test your compatibility with you and your friends by using the 'Go with your instinct' Mode in the Match Test and wait for the printer to print your compatibility score up to 100 on your photo. If you’re more of a quiz sort of gang, answer the questions and print out the results on a picture of you and your BFF. Last, but not least, select your image preference. You can choose between two image color modes Instax-Rich Mode for rich colors and Instax-Natural Mode for natural image quality. Also, print from videos and add frames, stickers or sketches to add more of your personality to your photos. There is no doubt, Creativity is in the AiR WITH THE Instax Mini Link 2 Smartphone Printer.Bundle Includes:Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 2 Instant Smartphone Printer (Clay White)Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 2 Instant Smartphone Printer (Clay White)2 x Fujifilm Instax Mini Twin Film Pack (20 Exposures)2 x Fujifilm Instax Mini Twin Film Pack (20 Exposures)

description: The HP ENVY Inspire 7958e is a premium multi-purpose home printer with everything families need to learn, work, and create. Loaded with features to print high-quality photos, homework, office docs and everything else. Includes the optional HP+ Smart Printing System that keeps itself up to date and ready to print from virtually anywhere at any time—at no additional cost.
features: FROM AMERICA'S MOST TRUSTED PRINTER BRAND – Perfect for printing documents, high-quality borderless photos in multiple sizes, creative projects and more. Print speeds up to 10 pages per minute color, 15 pages per minute black.

3 MONTHS OF INSTANT INK INCLUDED WITH HP+ – Print up to 700 pages a month and get ink delivered only when you need it. After 3 months, monthly fee applies unless cancelled, and you'll save up to 50% on ink.

INCLUDES HP+ SMART FEATURES – Activate HP+ to get advanced features for mobile printing, security, automatic updates and more. HP+ only works with an HP account, internet connection and Original HP Ink for the life of the printer.
KEY FEATURES – Print, copy, scan, automatic 2-sided printing, advanced photo features, separate photo tray, auto document feeder, mobile and wireless printing

VIBRANT PHOTOS – Photos that look as vibrant as they do on your screen with true-to-phone quality prints, plus custom photo features in the HP Smart app. HP 5x5" square and 4x12" panoramic photo paper sizes are optimized for the HP ENVY Inspire series
HP SMART APP – Print, scan and copy from your phone—from anywhere. Get additional advanced features with HP+
EASY TO GET IT ALL DONE – Easy wireless setup, customizable touchscreen shortcuts, self-healing Wi-Fi, auto document feeder
HP'S MOST SUSTAINABLE DESIGN – Made with over 45% recycled plastic content

title: Epson Expression Home XP-4200 Wireless Color All-in-One Printer with Scan, Copy, Automatic 2-Sided Printing, Borderless Photos and 2.4" Color Display,Black
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Inkjet Printers › Ink Tank Printers
description: Enjoy easy, everyday printing—plain and simple—with the Expression Home XP-4200. From coupons to directions, recipes to homework, the XP-4200 delivers the documents you need without missing a beat. Engineered with Epson’s state-of-the-art imaging technology, this high-performance, all-in-one solution also supports all your creative projects with exceptional image quality for remarkable prints and borderless photos. Plus, it offers convenient features and simple installation. *This product uses only genuine Epson-brand cartridges. Other brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies and not compatible and, even if described as compatible, may not function properly or at all. | 1. Requires Epson Smart Panel app download. Data usage fees may apply. | 2. Most features require an Internet connection to the printer, as well as an Internet- and/or email-enabled device. For a list of Epson Connect enabled printers and compatible devices and apps, visit www.epson/connect | 3. Epson Connect account and voice-activated account registration required. See www.epson/voice for device compatibility. | 4. For convenient and reasonable recycling options, visit www.epson/recycle | 5. SmartWay is an innovative partnership of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency that reduces greenhouse gases and other air pollutants and improves fuel efficiency.
features: Remarkable Print Quality for Home and Photo Printing — Epson’s leading-edge imaging technology produces crisp documents, vibrant borderless photos with rich colors, and more
Stress-Free Setup and Operation — Large 2.4" color display for effortless navigation, plus easy installation and operation through your smartphone or tablet using the Epson Smart Panel app (1)

Convenient Connectivity — Supports easy wireless connections and printing from Android or iOS devices (2); easily print and scan from your smart device with the Epson Smart Panel app (1), Mopria Print Service and Mopria Scan
Engineered for Reliability — Consistently delivers high-quality prints with Micro Piezo Heat Free technology and a permanent printhead designed to last the life of the printer
Easy, Affordable Printing — Individual ink cartridges make it easy to only replace the ink you need
Efficient, Economical Design — Automatic 2-sided printing helps you save paper and reduce paper waste
Hands-Free, Voice-Activated Printing — Easily print on the go using Alexa (3)
Versatile Functionality — Create searchable PDFs and more with included Epson ScanSmart scanning software
Epson Printing System Is Designed to Be Used Exclusively with Epson Genuine Cartridges — Use of non-genuine ink could cause damage not covered under the printer’s limited warranty
Print with voice: Connect your printer to Alexa to print a variety of content with your voice

title: Epson EcoTank ET-3830 Wireless Color All-in-One Cartridge-Free Supertank Printer with Scan, Copy, Auto 2-Sided Printing and Ethernet – The Perfect Printer Productive Families,White
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Inkjet Printers › Ink Tank Printers
description: Your busy home needs a printer that’s fast, affordable, easy to use, and has premium features. That’s why we developed the EcoTank ET-3830 – an innovative cartridge-free solution that uses high-capacity, easily refillable ink tanks. So you’ll worry less about running out of ink, and save a lot on replacement ink (1). The ET-3830 features fast printing with outstanding print quality, productive paper handling, a high-resolution flatbed scanner, and a large color display – making it the perfect printer for productive families.  Epson strongly recommends the use of genuine ink to ensure optimal print quality and performance. Use of non-genuine ink could cause damage not covered under the printer’s ltd. wnty. | 1. Actual savings and costs will vary considerably based on print tasks, print volumes and usage conditions. Savings and cost per ISO page are based on the cost of replacement ink bottles and the cost of enough standard cartridges to achieve the total page yields of the bottles using the MSRP (USD) and yields for Epson standard-capacity ink cartridges for similarly featured Epson consumer inkjet printers as of March 2024. | 2. Individual cartridges estimate based on print yields of an included or replacement set of black and color ink bottles as compared to Epson standard-capacity ink cartridges for similarly featured printers as of March 2024. | 3. Part of the ink from the included bottles is used for initial setup; yields are lower than those of replacement ink bottles. Replacement and included ink bottle yields based on the ISO/IEC 24712 pattern with Epson’s methodology. Actual ink yields will vary considerably for reasons including images printed, print settings, temperature and humidity. Yields may be lower when printing infrequently or predominantly with one ink color. All ink colors are used for printing and printer maintenance, and all colors must be available for printing. For more information, visit www.epson.com/inkinfo | 4. Based on average monthly document print volumes of about 200 pages. | 5. See www.epson.com/voice for device compatibility. Epson Connect™ account and voice-activated account registration required. | 6. Most features require an Internet connection to the printer, as well as an Internet- and/or email-enabled device. For a list of Epson Connect enabled printers and compatible devices and apps, visit www.epson.com/connect | 7. Requires Epson Smart Panel app download. Data usage fees may apply.
features: Innovative Cartridge-Free Printing ― No more tiny, expensive ink cartridges; each ink bottle set is equivalent to about 80 individual cartridges (2)
Dramatic Savings on Replacement Ink ― Save up to 90% with replacement ink bottles vs. ink cartridges (1) – that’s enough to print up to 7,500 pages black/6,000 color (3)
Stress-Free Printing — Up to 2 years of ink in the box (4) – and with every replacement ink set – for fewer out of ink frustrations
High-Capacity Ink Tanks ― Epson’s exclusive EcoFit ink bottles make filling easy and worry-free
Zero Cartridge Waste ― By using an EcoTank printer, you can help reduce the amount of cartridge waste ending up in landfills
Impressive Print Quality ― Unique PrecisionCore Heat-Free technology and pigment black ink produce extremely sharp text – plus impressive color photos and graphics – on virtually any paper type
Robust Paper Handling ― Paper-saving auto 2-sided printing and a 250-sheet paper tray for higher productivity
Built-In Scanner & Copier ― High-resolution flatbed scanner and a 2.4" color display for easy document copying and navigation
Modern Connectivity ― Features Ethernet and wireless, plus hands-free voice-activated printing (5). Easily print from your smart device (6) with the intuitive Epson Smart Panel app (7)
Use Genuine Epson Ink ― For optimal print quality and performance. Non-genuine ink could cause damage not covered by the printer’s limited warranty

title: HP OfficeJet 8015e Wireless Color All-in-One Printer, 3 months of Instant Ink included
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Inkjet Printers
description: The HP OfficeJet 8015e delivers increased productivity with fast speeds and custom mobile shortcuts. It includes the optional HP+ Smart Printing System that keeps itself up to date, secure, and ready to print from virtually anywhere at any time—at no additional cost.
features: 3 MONTHS OF INSTANT INK INCLUDED WITH HP+ – Print up to 700 pages a month and get ink delivered only when you need it. After 3 months, monthly fee applies unless cancelled, and you'll save up to 50% on ink

INCLUDES HP+ SMART FEATURES – Activate HP+ to get advanced features for mobile printing, security, automatic updates and more. HP+ only works with an HP account, internet connection and Original HP Ink for the life of the printer.
BEST FOR SMALL BUSINESSES AND HOME OFFICES – Print professional-quality color documents like forms, reports, brochures and presentations
KEY FEATURES – Fast color print, copy and scan, plus 2-sided printing, mobile and wireless printing, and an auto document feeder
FAST PRINT SPEEDS – Print up to 18 pages per minute in black and 10 pages per minute in color
DUAL BAND WI-FI – Self-healing Wi-FiTM automatically detects and resolves connection issues
HP SMART APP – Print, scan and copy from your phone—from anywhere. Get additional advanced features with HP+
SECURITY ESSENTIALS – Protect sensitive data with basic encryption, password protection, Wi-Fi security and document protection. Get enhanced cloud-based security features with HP+

This printer is intended to work only with cartridges with original HP chips or circuitry and will block cartridges using non-HP chips or circuitry. Periodic firmware updates will maintain the effectiveness of these measures

title: HPRT CP2100 Portable Photo Printer for iPhone & Android, 2.1x3.4 Mini Instant Color Printer, Bluetooth 5.0, Type-C Charging, Dye-Sublimation Tech, Initial 10 Sheets Included, White
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Photo Printers › Desktop Photo Printers
features: Make Your Memories Last: Using photostudio-grade dye-sublimation technology, the HPRT CP2100 delivers high-quality 300 DPI prints with a protective coating that ensures your cherished moments are preserved with vibrant colors and professional clarity for years to come.

Print Anytime, Anywhere: This mini photo printer measures just 3.27 x 5.75 inches and weighs 0.62 pounds, perfect for carrying on the go. With 5.0 Bluetooth connectivity to iOS or Android smart devices, you can instantly retain moments on the spots, whether you're capturing and sharing memories from graduations, creative projects, or everyday moments.

Print Stories, Not Just Moments: With HPRT CP2100, your memories come to life. Select a video from the HeyPhoto app and pick your favorite frame to print. Then, with HeyPhoto's AR scanning feature, get yourself back to the time to relive the excitement in vivid detail.

Have Fun with the HeyPhoto App: Edit and preview your photos intuitively with the HeyPhoto app before printing. Enjoy an interesting editing experience with various cute funny stickers, filters, frames, and collage feature to personalize your prints for creating photo books, photo walls, DIY projects, unique gifts, growing up albums, or fun scrapbooks.

Press, Insert, Print: Unlike the hassle of reloading consumables in other photo printers, the HPRT CP2100 features an integrated ribbon supply. Simply press the button, insert the ribbon, and you're ready to print. The printer comes with an initial ribbon that can print 10 photos.

attributes.value: HPRT CP2100 Portable Photo Printer, One-piece Ribbon Cartridge ( including 10 photo papers), User Manual

HPRT CP2100 Portable Photo Printer 
How to print with HPRT CP2100 
First, download HeyPhoto App from APP Store or Google Play. Then, insert the all-in-one cartridge, and power on the printer. After that, connect with the printer via bluetooth. Finally, edit your pictures with HeyPhoto and enjoy your prints. 
Have Fun with HeyPhoto & Personalized Your Pictures 
Previous page
Stickers & Frame 
Sprinkle some charm on your photos with adorable stickers and frames, letting you express every emotion and spontaneous idea! 
Filters 
Enhance your photos with a dash of flair using the array of filters to suit your mood and style. 
Collage 
Unleash your creativity by blending multiple moments into one captivating photo collage, a visual symphony of your memories! 
AR Printing 
Select a video from the HeyPhoto app and pick your favorite frame to print. Then, with HeyPhoto's AR scanning feature, get yourself back to the time to relive the excitement in vivid detail.

Dye-Sublimation Printing VS Zink Printing 
Dye-sublimation printing offers superior photo quality with vibrant colors and precise color reproduction compared to ZINK printing. Also, dye-sublimation prints are durable, water-resistant, and will not fade after long-term preservation. 
How to Get Consumables for CP2100 
You can find consumables at ASIN B0CVVND3JH. Alternatively, consider exploring our discounted printer and photo paper bundle for added convenience.

title: Canon Pixma iX6820 Wireless Business Printer with AirPrint and Cloud Compatible, Black
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Inkjet Printers › Ink Tank Printers
description: Help your business ideas get noticed with the Pixma iX6820 Wireless Inkjet Business Printer. The Pixma iX6820 is the ideal office printer, able to output everything from 4” x 6” mailers to 11” x 17” spreadsheets — even big 13” x 19” presentation charts. You’ll be impressed by the quality. With 9600 x 2400 maximum color dpi, it delivers exceptional printing detail. And with five individual ink tanks, you’ll not only get amazing color, you can replace only the color that runs out. The Pixma iX6820 helps to streamline your productivity with exclusive, downloadable Solution Templates. Say goodbye to the hassle of having to create every document from scratch. Another valuable feature of the Pixma iX6820 is My Image Garden software. My Image Garden puts all your favorite printing features, such as Special Filters and Full HD Movie Print, in one convenient software application. It also helps you organize your photos with calendar view and facial recognition. Plus, creative templates in various color combinations and patterns help to inspire your photo projects. In addition, you’ll have access to Creative Park Premium where you can download exclusive creative projects and content. Superior Resolution: 9600 x 2400 maximum color dpi produces incredible quality and detail in both your business documents and photos.4 Five Individual Ink Tank System: This high performance 5-color ink system consists of four dye-based inks for professional looking photos. A pigment-based black ink produces exceptionally crisp text. 1 Picoliter: 1-picoliter sized ink droplets produce sharp, exceptionally detailed photos. Print Documents and Web Pages Fast: Print documents and web pages with fast speeds of 14.5 images per minute (ipm) for black and 10.4 images per minute (ipm) for color.6 Borderless Photos Fast: Print a beautiful, borderless 4" x 6" photo in approximately 36 seconds.5, 12 ChromaLife100+: This system combines enhanced FINE print head technology with select genuine Canon photo papers and inks for beautiful borderless photos that will last up to 300 years when stored in an archival-quality photo album.7 Full HD Movie Print: Full HD Movie Print software turns your favorite HD movie clips captured with select Canon EOS Digital SLRs, PowerShot digital cameras and VIXIA camcorders into beautiful prints.8 My Image Garden: My Image Garden software makes organizing and printing your photos fun and easy with great facial recognition, Special Filters, Calendar Organization, Automatic Layout Suggestions and so much more!9 Creative Park Premium: An exclusive service for users of genuine Canon inks, offering access to photos, templates and more.10 Quiet Mode: This considerate feature lets you print anytime without worrying about disturbing those around you. Auto Power On: This convenient feature automatically powers up the printer whenever you send a photo or document to be printed. Solution Templates: Exclusive downloadable posters and business documents. Built-In Wireless: Print and scan wirelessly from any Wi-Fi enabled computer around the house.1 Pixma Printing Solutions (PPS): Pixma Printing Solutions (PPS) lets you print and scan photos or documents from your mobile device using the free PPS app.11 AirPrint: Print wirelessly and effortlessly from your compatible iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch – no drivers needed!2 Google Cloud Print: Allows users to print from Gmail and Google Docs on a mobile device, and from Google Chrome browser for Mac, Windows, Linux, and Chrome devices. With Google Cloud Print, you can print from wherever you are, from applications you use every day. You can even share your home and work printers with anyone you choose.3 Ethernet: This wired LAN interface lets you connect to a home or office network. Hi-Speed USB: Plug the cable into your PC for a super-fast connection for your data transfers
features: OS compatibility: Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 7 , Windows 7 SP1, Windows Vista SP1, Vista SP2, Windows XP SP3 32 bit13; Mac compatibility: Mac OS X v10.6.8 v10.913
Utilizes Air Print, Google Cloud Print and Pixma Printing Solutions (PPS)

description: Printing stunning, eye-catching photos is easy and efficient with the Kodak Step Slim photo printer. Enjoy creating prints with a super thin, palm-sized photo printer. The design of this instant printer is both trendy and compact making it a great companion for photographers, students, tourists, and anyone else that like taking photos on the go. Capture beautiful moments, jaw-dropping scenery, and epic memories then print them on water-resistant, smudge-proof, and tear-resistant paper so you have them for years to come.
features: SLEEK. STYLISH. SLIM – Print beautiful, vibrant photos with a thin, compact printer. The glossy, fashionable design is guaranteed to be a fabulous tool for influencers, photographers, and scrapbookers.

TAKE PHOTOS ON THE GO - Travel to all your favorite places with a lightweight, pocket-sized printer and create prints in under a minute. Don’t worry about messy wiring, computer connection, or bulky equipment, simply print photos anywhere and everywhere with ease.

SHAKE THINGS UP – Connect this printer to the KODAK STEP Prints app on your smartphone. Then, personalize your photos on the free editing app so your pictures really pop. Add frames, stickers, and so much more.
THINK ZERO INK – Print gorgeous, colorful 2” x 3” pictures on Zink ink-free paper. Enjoy developing dry-to-the-touch, quality photos without the need of ink or toners.

SHARE YOUR STYLE – Put your customizable photos on social media for your friends and family to enjoy. Or print your memorable photos and place them on your walls, locker, laptop and more using the sticky backing.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Kodak Step Slim Photo Printer 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Making photo-printing easy and convenient. 
Previous page
A Hot New Look 
Show off the sleek, shiny design of the KODAK STEP Slim Printer to friends and family. 
Anytime, Anywhere 
Take the KODAK STEP Slim Printer with you so you are ready to print on vacation or family outings. 
Modernize How You Print 
Connect the KODAK STEP Slim Printer to your smartphone via Bluetooth for swift, simple printing. 
Decorate your World 
Stick your adhesive-backed photos to your walls, locker, bag, notebooks and other belongings. 
Charge Up Again and Again 
Print 25 photos in a single charge then charge up the built-in battery for more photo printing. 
Next page
1 Slim Design 2 Portable Printing 3 Bluetooth Connectivity 4 Sticky-backed Photos 5 Rechargeable Battery 
Kodak Step Prints App 
Previous page
Supports Kodak Sticker Photo Paper 
This user-friendly app was made to accommodate Kodak 2x3 Pre-cut too. With a simple setting change, you can print out two stickers per print using a 30 pack of Kodak Pre-cut Sticker Photo Paper. 
Expert Editing 
With the KODAK STEP Prints app, you can do more than standard editing. Make your photos really shine by adjusting the brightness, color, blur, and so much more. 
Collage 
The only thing better than one vibrant photo is four in one. Use the KODAK STEP Prints app to turn four standout photos into one gorgeous collage. 
Stickers & Filters 
Add a fun new element to your photo with the KODAK STEP Prints app’s incredible customization. With tons of stickers, frames, and filters at your disposal, you can really make each photo your own. 
Next page
ZINK Zero Ink Technology 
Previous page
Long-lasting Prints 
Print your happy memories on tear-resistant, smudge-proof & waterproof paper that will last for years to come. 
Inkless Printing 
Don’t worry about have to reload your printer with more ink cartridges or ribbons. ZINK Photo Paper works without the need for ink. 
Made in the US 
Quality, reliable paper you can trust made right here in America. The ZINK development and manufacturing facility is located in Whitsett, North Carolina. 
Detailed Photos 
See the big, bright smiles of family and friends on paper that brings out crisp details and vibrant colors in every print. 
Next page
Start creating vibrant prints in four easy steps. 
Previous page
Step One 
Remove cover and insert KODAK ZINK Photo Paper. Blue sheet should be bottom of the paper stack. 
Step Two 
Download the KODAK STEP Prints app from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store. 
Step Three 
Use the photo-editing app to customize your photo. Then watch a beautiful photo print. 
Step Four 
Keep your personalized photos on your smartphone and share your pictures on social media. 
Next page
1 Load Paper 2 Download App 3 Edit + Print 4 Share 
What makes the KODAK STEP Slim printer unique? 
The KODAK STEP Slim printer is the slim and sleek version of the KODAK STEP printer. It’s compact design and trimmed down look is sure to be something you’ll love. 
Is the Kodak Step Prints app required to use this printer? 
Yes, the app is required. You can download the app from Google Play or the App Store on your Android or iOS device. 
How do I perform the Bluetooth pairing for my printer? 
First, press and hold the power button on the printer. Next, open the Bluetooth settings on your phone. Finally, select the KODAK STEP Slim printer when it appears on the Bluetooth list. 
Do I need to replace the batteries? 
No, you do not need to replace the batteries in the printer. The KODAK STEP Slim printer is rechargeable. Plug in the device with a micro-USB cable to charge it. Once it is charged, you can print out 25 photos in a single charge. 
What is KODAK ZINK 2” x 3” sticky-backed paper? 
KODAK ZINK 2” x 3” sticky-backed paper is 2” x 3” sized photo paper that doesn’t need ink, toners, or cartridges and can be place anywhere with its adhesive backing.

description: The HP Envy 6155e All-in-One delivers color printing, scanning and copying, plus 100-sheet paper capacity. It includes wireless and mobile printing capabilities to keep your multifunction printer connected, and prints high-quality documents and photos every time with true-to-screen tech. This inkjet printer also lets you easily navigate print jobs with its intuitive color touchscreen.
features: FROM AMERICA'S MOST TRUSTED PRINTER BRAND – The Envy 6155e is perfect for homes printing everyday color documents like homework and borderless photos. Print speeds up to 7 ppm color, 10 ppm black.
KEY FEATURES – Color print, copy and scan, plus auto 2-sided printing and a 100-sheet input tray.
HP'S MOST INTUITIVE COLOR TOUCHSCREEN – Smoothly navigate your printer with the easy-to-use 2.4" touchscreen.
WIRELESS PRINTING – Stay connected with our most reliable dual-band Wi-Fi, which automatically detects and resolves connection issues.
TRUE-TO-SCREEN TECH – Print documents and photos that look as vibrant as they do on your screen with HP's P3 technology.
HP APP – Print, scan, copy, or fax right from your smartphone with the easiest-to-use print app.

3 MONTHS OF INK WITH HP+ ACTIVATION – Subscribe to Instant Ink delivery service to get ink delivered directly to your door before you run out. After 3 months, monthly fee applies unless cancelled, and you save up to 50%.
SUSTAINABLE DESIGN – Made with at least 60% recycled plastic. Choose HP to help forests thrive—for every page you print, HP protects, restores and manages forests.

This printer is intended to work only with cartridges with original HP chips or circuitry and will block cartridges using non-HP chips or circuitry. Periodic firmware updates will maintain the effectiveness of these measures.

title: Fujifilm Instax Mini Link Pink Printer Bundle
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
description: The new Instax Mini Link smartphone printer is a successor to the Instax Share sp-2 smartphone printer. With its sleek and light body design, revamped app, fun social features, and Bluetooth capability, The Instax Mini Link will surely grab attention. Its user-friendly app experience (download of free app is required) will allow people to easily customize their photos with close to 30 fun and colorful frames, create collage and split prints and print photos from their videos. Plus the Instax Mini Link app will have two modes – print mode and fun mode. With fun mode, users would be able to connect up to 5 smartphones to the Instax Mini Link and print a photo collage with party print or have fun discovering their compatibility with others using the compatibility test. The Instax Mini Link will also have a motion sensor in which users can zoom in or zoom out to take a photo with the app by tilting the printer or reprint photos by turning the printer upside down and pressing the Instax button.

description: It's here! Meet the printer made for crafting, scrapbooking and is packed with lots of fun features the PIXMA TS9521C Crafter's All In One printer. Designed with the features you want like 12"x12" borderless printing, versatile paper feeding options including greeting card stock, and built in printable patterns this printer gives you the ultimate in printing versatility. It can handle all your everyday printing needs too, such as photos, school projects, documents, invitations and more. Additionally, with the support of Wi Fi, Air Print and Morea Print Service, an auto document feeder for scanning and copying, and a built in SD Memory Card slot5, this printer will meet all of your needs with the quality you expect from Canon.
features: The PIXMA TS9521C has 5 Individual Inks that are ready for craft projects & everyday needs; ChromaLife100 protects photos from fading; 100 years; Album, 30 years; Behind glass, 20 years; Without glass
Print from all your favorite devices, whether that is a smartphone, tablet, memory card or computer; With Air Print, Morea Print Service, and Wi Fi the PIXMA TS9521C is ready for all your devices

With 12'x12 inches paper support, booklet layout copy, oversized scanning and Auto Document Feeder for multi-page documents, the PIXMA TS9521C is extremely versatile and ready to handle lots of projects

title: Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 3 Smartphone Printer - Clay White
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Film Photography › Film Cameras › Instant Cameras
description: Instax Mini Link 3
features: Fujifilm

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Instax Mini Link 3 - Bring Fun To Life 
The instax mini Link 3 Smartphone printer lets you transform your everyday moments into colorful instax mini instant photos. Download of free instax mini Link App required. Connects wirelessly via Bluetooth to your Smartphone. Requires instax mini instant film (sold separately) 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Simple Print 
The instax mini Link 3 Smartphone printer helps you print images on your Smartphone roll. Requires instax mini instant film (sold separately). 
Frame Print 
Add a frame, a sticker, emoji, or text with the Frame Print App feature! It’s sure to bring even more fun to your everyday. 
Video Print 
With the free instax mini Link App, pick your favorite moment from a video on your Smartphone, then hit print and print an instax mini photo. 
Reprint 
Love an image you just printed, turn it upside down, press & hold the power button for 1 second and another copy of your last printed image will print 
Click to Collage – Create the ultimate in-App photobooth experience! 
The Click to Collage App feature captures a series of six images at three second intervals. You can then choose two, four or six fun-tastic images to print as a collage on your instax mini instant photo, before all six images are turned into an animation (perfect for sharing on social). 
instax AiR Studio 
With the instax AiR Studio App feature, add ‘in-the-moment’ 3D AR effects before taking photos with your Smartphone. Then save up to 20 of your image creations in the App to print later or capture a video of the action to share another. Download the free instax mini Link App to access the instax AiR Studio App feature. When using this App feature, scan the floor with your Smartphone to define your exclusive photography space, then choose a background and a bit of décor! 
Collage Print 
Collage Print App feature lets you print a single instax mini instant photo! That’s right, one ultimate photo that combines all your favorite moments 
Remote Shooting 
Using the instax Camera feature & App, position your Smartphone, get everyone into the frame and take the shot remotely by pressing the power button. 
Design Focus 
instax mini Link 3 Smartphone printer features 3 beautiful LED lights on the front. Pulses different colors depending on functionality of the printer. 
Powered Up 
With a USB Type C port, getting charged up is quick & easy, letting you print instax mini instant photos on-the-go whenever the moment strikes.

title: Fujifilm Instax Link Wide Printer - Mocha Gray
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Film Photography › Film Cameras › Instant Cameras
description: Live Life Wide. The Exciting Instax Link Wide Smartphone Printer Has Landed. Creating The Largest Prints In The Instax Product Line-Up, This Wide-Format Smartphone Printer Is Overflowing With ‘Must-Have’ Features To Make Sure Nothing Is Lost. After All, The ‘Fullness’ Of Every Moment Should Be Captured For All To See. That’S Why We Say ‘Print It Wide’. Not Only Does The Instax Link Wide Printer Let You Get Everyone In The Photo, But The Free Instax Link Wide Downloadable App Also Adds A Whole Other Dimension. Connect Your Smartphone To The Printer Wirelessly Via Bluetooth, And You’Re Able To Add Text To Your Photos, Resize, Apply A Filter, Play With The Contrast - The Options Are Endless. Swipe Up On Your Smartphone Photo And Print.Select Your Image Preference. You Can Choose Between Two Image Color Modes – Instax-Rich Mode For Rich Colors And Instax-Natural Mode For A Natural Image Quality. Personalize Your Photo And Choose From Over 30 Ed-Itable Templates To Create Greeting Cards, Invitations And Much More. Apply A Qr Code To Your Photo To Link To A Url, Hear Sounds You Recorded And View Secret Messages And Locations – Just By Scanning The Qr Code With Your Smartphone. And That’S Not All! Be Creative With The Sketch, Edit & Print Feature To Import Text And Sketches As You Customize Your Photos. With The Collage Print Fea-Ture, Add Multiple Images Together To Create Fun Collages. Also, Choose From Over 1,600 “Stickers” In The App To Apply To Your Photo! Available In Ash White And Mocha Gray. Live Life Wide.
features: Connects Wirelessly Via Bluetooth To Your Smartphone
For Use With Instax Wide Instant Film Only (Sold Separately)
Prints 3”X 5” Photos
Over 30 Editable Templates, Qr Print Mode To Add Urls, Sounds And Messages, 1,600 Photo-Worthy, In-App Stickers

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Live life WIDE 
This is it. The exciting INSTAX LINK WIDE Smartphone Printer has landed. Creating the largest prints in the INSTAX product line-up, this wide-format ‘must-have’ is the Smartphone Printer that gets everyone in. 
All about the INSTAX LINK WIDE 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Discover the NEW INSTAX LINK WIDE 
Simple Print 
Supercharged simplicity 
You’re on! Sharing moments together couldn’t be easier. Via the free LINK WIDE downloadable App, select the image from your camera roll that you want to print and do your thing. Connect your Smartphone to the printer wirelessly via Bluetooth, add text to your photos, resize, apply a filter, play with the contrast - the options are endless! Swipe up on your photo and print. 
Video Print 
And pause... 
Print your memories with the free INSTAX LINK WIDE downloadable App. Scroll through your favorite videos on your camera roll, select the perfect frame and then print it WIDE. While you’re at it, how about adding a hidden message or a link to the video through a QR code? 
Multi-Print 
Share and share alike 
First rule of friendship? Nobody gets left out. With the INSTAX LINK WIDE Smartphone Printer, swipe up to print and decide just how many copies you want. The more you add, the more mementos of the good times you’ll have to share with your friends. We’re so inclusive you can even connect the INSTAX LINK WIDE Smartphone Printer to, and print directly from, a FUJIFILM X-S10 digital camera. 
QR Modes 
Give a little more 
Apply a QR code to your photo to link to a URL, hear sounds you recorded and view secret messages and locations – just by scanning the QR code with your Smartphone. 
Color Modes 
Choose your look 
Choose INSTAX-Rich mode for rich colors or INSTAX-Natural mode for a natural image quality. – Two very different color outputs, two distinctive ways to add some vibrancy into memorable moments before printing them instantly onto WIDE film. What mode will you choose?

features: FROM AMERICA'S MOST TRUSTED PRINTER BRAND – The OfficeJet Pro 9125e is perfect for offices printing professional-quality color documents like presentations, brochures and flyers. Print speeds up to 18 ppm color, 22 ppm black.

WIRELESS PRINTING – Stay connected with our most reliable dual-band Wi-Fi, which automatically detects and resolves connection issues
HP APP – Print, scan, copy, or fax right from your smartphone with the easiest-to-use print app

3 MONTHS OF PRINTING INCLUDED – Subscribe to Instant Ink delivery service to get ink delivered directly to your door before you run out. After 3 months, monthly fee applies unless cancelled, and you save up to 50%.
PROTECTS YOUR DATA – Built-in HP Wolf Pro Security uses a powerful suite of customizable tools that boosts security and helps keep networks protected against cyber threats and malware

title: Canon Megatank GX1020 All-in-One Wireless Supertank [Megatank] Printer | Print, Copy and Scan| Mobile Printing |2.7" LCD Color Touchscreen | Auto Duplex Printing
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Inkjet Printers › Ink Tank Printers
description: Business Quality Printing from the Comfort of Home. Canon MegaTank printers are a great choice for high quality printing, value, and performance to help you get the job done. Great for hybrid working environments, the GX1020 has plenty of features to keep you productive from home or office, with office-like print quality. The GX1020 MegaTank All-in-One inkjet printer delivers high-quality, low-cost printing, and outstanding wireless connectivity in a compact size. Get serious print productivity with a high page yield of up to 3,000 Black / 3,000 Color pages with just a single set of inks. Plus, the GX1020 comes with a 3-year limited warranty or 60,000 pages (whichever comes first) and is backed by Canon’s friendly and knowledgeable Service and Support network, so you can have peace of mind and focus on the business at hand. You’ll get a stable, reliable connection with dual band WiFi, fast print speeds and generous paper capacity of up to 250 sheets. The adjustable 2.7-inch touchscreen makes it easy to view and navigate through functions. The GX1020 is easy to set up and maintain and offers great media versatility to print on a variety of media types and sizes, including photo paper, envelopes, banners and more. Create beautiful and professional posters, banners and signage with Poster Artist Online. Print both documents and photos on a variety of paper types using a 4-color pigment-based ink system for sharp black text and dye-based colors for vivid photos up to 8.5” x 14”. Setting up the GX1020 is easy. You can connect through high-speed USB or wirelessly from computers or mobile devices. The GX1020 is also Chromebook compatible.

features: FROM AMERICA'S MOST TRUSTED PRINTER BRAND – The Envy 6555e is perfect for homes printing everyday color documents like homework and borderless photos. Print speeds up to 7 ppm color, 10 ppm black.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Darkrooms just got smaller. 
The new Polaroid Lab is your very own desktop darkroom. It uses 100% real film chemistry to expose the digital photos on your phone and process them into a Polaroid picture. Something real, something to hold, something to give. 
From Phone to Polaroid. 
Unleash all the creative power within the Polaroid Lab with the Polaroid Originals companion app. The app connects the Lab to your phone to turn your digital pictures into Polaroid photos you can keep. App available on the Apple App Store or Google Play. App is required for Lab operation. 
Turn pixels into proof. 
Press Red to remember with the Polaroid Lab. A 3-lens system that acts like a desktop darkroom to transform your digital phone pictures into real Polaroid pictures - in an instant. Something real, something to hold, something to give. Lab uses 600 or i-Type film. 
100% real chemistry 
80 years of Polaroid film innovation now just a few taps away. The Polaroid Lab uses a 3-lens system to project the screen image from your phone, exposing it onto Polaroid film. Our unique chemical process then develops the image into a Polaroid picture. No printing, no scanning, just an instant formula for timeless images. 
Don't take pictures. Make pictures. 
Never lose a moment again with the Polaroid Lab. A 3-lens system that acts like a desktop darkroom to transform the digital photos from your phone into real Polaroid pictures - in an instant. 
Cloud storage to fridge door storage. 
Pluck your memories from the cloud and bring them into the real world with the Polaroid Lab. It transforms your digital photos into real Polaroid pictures – no more storage needed. 
The Polaroid Originals app 
Unlock the creative tools of the Polaroid Lab with added features included with the Polaroid Originals app. You can create collages of up to 9 frames or bring your stills to life with our new augmented reality tool. App available on the Apple App Store or Google Play. 
Take now, make later. 
Turn that one idea into many with the Polaroid Lab. Using our Polaroid Originals app, you can create seamless collages of up to 9 frames composed in any which way you like. 
Digital to analog. And back. 
Our new augmented reality tool brings your memories to life. Using the Polaroid Originals app, you can layer still images with motion. Make for you or make for someone else.

title: Epson EcoTank ET-4800 Wireless All-in-One Cartridge-Free Supertank Printer with Scanner, Copier, Fax, ADF and Ethernet – Ideal-for Your Home Office, White
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Inkjet Printers › Ink Tank Printers
description: Your home office needs a printer that’s fast, affordable, and easy to use. That’s why we developed the EcoTank ET-4800 – an innovative cartridge-free solution that uses high-capacity, easily refillable ink tanks. So you’ll worry less about running out of ink, and save a lot on replacement ink (1). The ET-4800 features genuine Epson print quality, an auto document feeder, fax, a high-resolution flatbed scanner, and convenient color display – making it the perfect basic home office printer.  Epson strongly recommends the use of genuine ink to ensure optimal print quality and performance. Use of non-genuine ink could cause damage not covered under the printer’s ltd. wnty. | 1. Actual savings and costs will vary considerably based on print tasks, print volumes and usage conditions. Savings and cost per ISO page are based on the cost of replacement ink bottles and the cost of enough standard cartridges to achieve the total page yields of the bottles using the MSRP (USD) and yields for Epson standard-capacity ink cartridges for similarly featured Epson consumer inkjet printers as of March 2024. | 2. Individual cartridges estimate based on print yields of an included or replacement set of black and color ink bottles as compared to Epson standard-capacity ink cartridges for similarly featured printers as of March 2024. | 3. Part of the ink from the included bottles is used for initial setup; yields are lower than those of replacement ink bottles. Replacement and included ink bottle yields based on the ISO/IEC 24712 pattern with Epson’s methodology. Actual ink yields will vary considerably for reasons including images printed, print settings, temperature and humidity. Yields may be lower when printing infrequently or predominantly with one ink color. All ink colors are used for printing and printer maintenance, and all colors must be available for printing. For more information, visit www.epson.com/inkinfo | 4. Based on average monthly document print volumes of about 125 pages. | 5. See www.epson.com/voice for device compatibility. Epson Connect account and voice-activated account registration required. | 6. Most features require an Internet connection to the printer, as well as an Internet- and/or email-enabled device. For a list of Epson Connect enabled printers and compatible devices and apps, visit www.epson.com/connect | 7. Requires Epson Smart Panel app download. Data usage fees may apply.
features: Innovative Cartridge-Free Printing ― High-capacity ink tanks mean no more tiny, expensive ink cartridges

Dramatic Savings on Replacement Ink ― Save up to 90% with replacement ink bottles vs. ink cartridges (1) – that’s enough to print up to 4,500 pages black/7,500 color (2), equivalent to about 90 individual ink cartridges (3)
Stress-Free Printing — Up to 2 years of ink in the box (4) – and with every replacement ink set – for fewer out of ink frustrations
Zero Cartridge Waste – By using an EcoTank printer, you can help reduce the amount of cartridge waste ending up in landfills
Impressive Print Quality ― Unique Micro Piezo Heat-Free Technology produces sharp text – plus impressive color photos and graphics – on virtually any paper type
Built-in Scanner & Copier ― High-resolution flatbed scanner and a color display for easy document copying and navigation
Modern Connectivity ― Features Ethernet and wireless, plus hands-free voice-activated printing (5). Easily print from your smart device (6) with the intuitive Epson Smart Panel App (7)

Designed for Reliability ― Worry-free 2-year limited warranty with registration (8), including full unit replacement. Genuine Epson Ink ― For genuine Epson quality; use of non-genuine ink could cause damage not covered under the printer’s limited warranty

With Epson Email Print, you can print from any device that can send email, such as your smartphone, tablet, or laptop. Just activate your product's unique email address. When you want to print, attach a PDF, Microsoft Office document, or photo to an email and send it to your product. Both the email and the attachments will print automatically.
Visit epson.com/connect (U.S) or epson.ca/connect (Canada) to learn more about Email Print, create your Epson Connect account, and register your product to the Epson Connect service.

At approximately 7 x 5 x 2", the SELPHY is a portable photo printer that supports four different paper sizes, including small adhesive stickers. features: 【Thermal Printing】 Used to print small labels, photos, receipt, records, memos and lists. Download APP application "iLabel" has a variety of built-in templates, which can be used to edit photos or customize text sizes, saving time and effort.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
About iLabel 
iLabel app offers 9 editting modes. No matter you want to use for, you can select the function below to use. 
1.Picture printing 
2.Graphic and text printing 
3.Document printing 
4.Labels for small business and home organizer 
5.To do list template 
6.Scan print 
LetSketch bluetooth thermal printer 
Easy to connect and print. Not matter you print text, picture, note or label, LetSketch mini thermal printer will be your best partner. 
What will you use for? 
Photo printing 
LetSketch printer is compatible with smartphone via bluetooth. You can edit your picture before printing. 
Receipt Printing 
Thermal printers do not require ink, toner or ribbon. Lower cost than the original printer. very suitable to put in the pocket of your bag or jacket 
Label making 
There are a lot of templates for you to make a creative label. 10 fonts for chooce 
Refrigerator Decor 
Kids' Paiting 
Pets' Bowl Decor 
Backpack Decor 
Multipurpose 
1.Decoration: DIY a beautiful Label for gift, DIY candle, DIY perfume 
2.Organizer: Mark labels for disorganized stuffs, just like seasoning, cloth, cable, file 
3.Sticker maker: mini printer is a good partner for the journal book. Take a picture or download any illustration, print it and prune. Decorating your journal book to record your mood in this moment. 
how to use it? 
Only need a Bluetooth-enabled mobile phone 
Step 1: Find ilabel in Google App Store to download and install 
Step 2: Turn on the Bluetooth function of the mobile phone, double-click the button to scan the QR code 
Step 3: Find the corresponding device on the mobile phone software to connect to the printer 
Step 4: Choose a template to print 
Product specification 
Bluetooth 4.0 Connection. Connected to the iLabel APP through Bluetooth. System: for android 4.3, for IOS9.0 or above. The App include 6 plates: Notes, Scan, Print Images, Templates, Micro print and Toolbox. You can choose cute templates to do the list. Via Scan you can easy to do study notes, just take a picture and then print it. You will find a lot of fun in Toolbox. Just find the function what you want!

description: The HP Smart Tank 7001 Printer is a smart, connected and refillable tank printer that makes printing seamless for your home with its high capacity and wireless connectivity. Create everyday color documents at a low cost with 2 years of Original HP Ink included in the box. This Smart Tank printer is an inkjet perfect for high-volume printing.
features: FROM AMERICA'S MOST TRUSTED PRINTER BRAND – The Smart Tank 7001 is perfect for families printing a variety of color documents in high volumes. Print up to 15 pages per minute black and 9 pages per minute color.
FULLY LOADED WITH SAVINGS – Best for low-cost, high-volume printing—2 years of HP Ink included; get up to 8,000 color pages or 6,000 black pages right out of the box
KEY FEATURES – Print, copy and scan, plus automatic 2-sided printing, borderless prints, mobile and wireless printing
BEST EVERYDAY PRINT QUALITY – HP tank printers deliver crisp text and frame-worthy photos with vivid, true-to-life colors for consistently impressive prints
EASIEST-TO-USE TANK PRINTERS – Quick setup, easy print and scan, reliable Wi-Fi and an app that makes it all easy
HP APP – Print, scan, copy or fax right from your smartphone with the easiest-to-use print app
WORRY-FREE Wi-Fi – Stay connected with self-healing dual-band Wi-Fi that automatically detects and resolves connection issues
PROTECTS YOUR DATA – HP Wolf Essential Security helps maintain privacy and control with basic encryption and password protection
MESS-FREE REFILL – Replenish ink with HP's easy-access, spill-free refill system. Simply plug the ink bottles into the ink tank and let them drain—no squeezing, no spilling.

title: Brother ColAura VC-500W Color Photo & Label Printer, Compact & Versatile, Wi-Fi Enabled, Free Design Software & App with Templates, Prints in Full Color, Without Ink Using Zink Zero Ink Technology
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
description: ColAura, the versatile, compact c0olor photo and label printer, is perfect for photo enthusiasts, crafty crafters, creative makers, and small businesses. ColAura is Wi-Fi enabled so you can print directly from your iOS® and Android™ smart phones and tablets, just about any time, anywhere, when connected to a wireless network. Tackle office and organizational tasks, business projects, address labels and more. The FREE Color Label Editor 2 App1 includes thousands of fun elements, such as frames, fonts, symbols, backgrounds, and ready-made designs for your mobile device. Use the FREE P-touch Editor software1 to print a wide variety of professional-looking labels from your Windows or Mac® computer to easily tackle a myriad of office and organizational tasks, business projects, address labels and more. Use ColAura and stand out from the crowd with custom labels, logos, and stickers that will make your products pop. With ColAura, you can print photographs in full color, up to 17-inches. ColAura uses ZINK® Zero Ink® Technology that prints amazing full color labels, photos, and stickers using ZINK Paper®. No need for ink cartridges, ribbons, or toners. The colors required for printing are embedded in the ZINK Paper® which is water, tear, and smudge resistant. Plus, a secure adhesive backing adheres to most surfaces. ColAura is the ideal color photo and label printer for holiday gatherings, celebratory parties, and personalized crafting. Add colorful decorations to gifts for that next birthday party. Add a splash of personalization and decorate a dorm room with a photo wall of fun and beautiful memories made with friends. With ColAura, the possibilities are endless. When you are ready to dream it, create it, and then print it, outfit your ColAura with Genuine Brother CZ and CK rolls. Brother Genuine CZ and CK rolls are available in five widths: Paper rolls available in 3/8 inch, ½ inch, ¾ inch, 1-inch and ~ 2-inch (50mm) widths. The built-in automatic cutter is simple to use - choose half or full cuts for just the right length. ColAura comes with everything you need to get started including a 1-inch roll of ZINK® Zero Ink® Technology paper, a cleaning roll, and power adapter so you can get started right out of the box. Disclaimers: 1Compatibility may vary by device and operating system. Requires connection to a wireless network. All referenced trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective companies. AirPrint and Mac is a registered trademark of Apple Inc. IOS is a trademark or registered trademark of Cisco in the U.S. and other countries and is used under license. Android is a trademark of Google LLC. ZINK, Zero Ink, ZINK Paper and ZINK technology are trademarks owned by Zink Holdings, LLC.
features: Versatile printing for unlimited uses; Create and print labels, photos, stickers and more to decorate, personalize and customize gifts; from photo projects and party favors to a variety of organization tasks, business projects, home decor, and more

title: HP ENVY 6455e Wireless Color Inkjet Printer, Print, scan, copy, Easy setup, Mobile printing, Best-for-home, Instant Ink with HP+ (3 months included),white
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Inkjet Printers
description: The HP ENVY 6455e makes it easy to print, scan and copy creative projects, borderless photos and homework with automatic 2-sided printing and the automatic document feeder. It includes the optional HP+ Smart Printing System that keeps itself up to date and ready to print from virtually anywhere at any time—at no additional cost.
features: FROM AMERICA'S MOST TRUSTED PRINTER BRAND – Best for home printing, including basic color documents like recipes, forms and travel documents. Print speeds up to 8.5 pages per minute in black or 5 pages per minute in color.
KEY FEATURES – Print, copy and scan in color, plus mobile and wireless printing

INCLUDES HP+ SMART FEATURES – Upgrade to HP+ during setup to get advanced features for mobile printing, security, automatic updates and more. HP+ only works with an HP account, internet connection and Original HP Ink for the life of the printer
CONNECTIVITY – Dual-band Wi-Fi with self-reset automatically detects and resolves connectivity issues. Also includes USB 0 port.

HP SMART APP – Simple, step-by-step guided setup. Print, scan, and copy everyday documents from your phone—from anywhere. Get advanced features with HP+ in the Smart app including mobile fax and advanced scanning features such as multi-item recognition

3 MONTHS OF INSTANT INK INCLUDED WITH HP+ – Print up to 700 pages a month and get ink delivered only when you need it. After 3 months, monthly fee applies unless cancelled, and you'll save up to 50% on ink

This printer is intended to work only with cartridges with original HP chips or circuitry and will block cartridges using non-HP chips or circuitry. Periodic firmware updates will maintain the effectiveness of these measures. More at hp.com/learn/ds

title: HP Sprocket Photo Booth Machine Instant Color Photo Printer - 10.1" Touchscreen, LED Ring Light - Customize w/250+ Fun Frames, Prints on 3x4 Zink Paper or Share via QR Code, Mobile Notify App -Pink
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Lighting & Studio › Photo Studio › Posing Props
description: Take your next event to the next level with the HP Sprocket Photobooth! This one-of-a-kind photobooth device lets you instantly take and share fun, customized photos on 3x4” sticky-backed photo paper. Simply choose from the available categories to find the perfect layout for your event, select and customize your frames and filters and get the photobooth magic started! The 10.1” adjustable LCD touch screen offers a live view of your photos with layouts and filters applied, so you can make sure your photo looks just right before capturing the moment. And, with an LED ring light and flash built-in, you can confidently capture every detail in clear, bright color. When your photo is ready, sharing is easy. Simply hit print and watch as your photo instantly prints without the need for expensive ink or toners on ZINK paper. Your sticky-backed prints come out smudge-proof, water-resistant, and tear-resistant, so you can stick them anywhere and know they’ll last. Prefer digital copies? No problem. Connect to Wi-Fi and easily generate a QR code for fast and easy photo sharing and downloads. Snap, print, and share the instant photo fun!
features: PICTURE-PERFECT PRINTS Built-in flash and LED ring light make it easy to get that picture-perfect shot, every time. Select your layout, frame, and filters and get a live view of it all on the 10.1” LCD touch screen before hitting print.

YOUR PHOTO BOOTH, YOUR WAY Create a custom event in 3 simple steps, choose and customize frames & filters, and take control of guest privileges like max prints, photo sharing, restricted access, and more. Manage preferences for audio, brightness, screensavers and language! Great for event planners.

ZINK TECHNOLOGY Print photos on Zink sticky-backed paper and stick them to your scrapbook, bullet journal, photo wall, and more! Zink paper prints without the need for ink or toner, and has colors embedded inside for resistance to water, smudges, and tears. Stay on top of paper status in the app.

PORTABLE PHOTO FUN Weighing in at just over 8 pounds, it’s easy to bring the photobooth fun to any event and immediately make it the life of the party. With 250+ fun frames and stickers to choose from for every occasion, you’re sure to find the perfect ones to take any event to the next level.

SHARE IT YOUR WAY Print multiple copies of the same photo for fast and easy sharing with friends or generate a QR code when connected to Wi-Fi to download and share digital copies. Photos are automatically stored to the cloud, where they can be shared and managed at any time.

aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Previous page
Frame it Your Way 
Choose from hundreds of fun frames to find the perfect backdrop for any photo, any occasion. 
Sharing is Caring 
Generate a QR code via Wi-Fi for fast and easy digital photo sharing with your friends. 
Shine the Perfect Light 
Built-in ring light and flash create the perfect lighting for clear, bright photos every time. 
Stay in the Know 
Download the Sprocket Photobooth app for real-time updates on printer status, paper jams and more. 
Any Way You Mount It 
Find the perfect mounting setup for any event - whether it's on a tabletop, door, wall, or tripod. 
Next page
1 250+ Available Frames 2 Wi-Fi Sharing 3 Right Light and Flash 4 Companion App 5 Mounting Capabilities 
Previous page
Choose a Layout 
Select your event type from the available categories - wedding, graduation, holidays, and more. 
Personalize Event 
Choose your frames, customize your titles and captions, and pick a screensaver. 
Customize Settings 
Take control of the event. Set a print limit for guests, enable/disable photo sharing, and more. 
Smile + Share! 
Smile, snap, & share the love! Print and share instant photos or generate a QR code and go digital. 
Next page
1 Step One 2 Step Two 3 Step Three 4 Step Four 
Previous page
Your Photos, Your Way 
Choose from hundreds of available frames and filters on the device to unleash your creativity and give your pictures a personal touch. 
Long-Lasting Prints for Long-Lasting Fun 
Capture every moment on durable 3x4" Zero Ink paper - smudge-proof, water-resistant, tear-resistant, and built to last. 
Print Like a Pro 
For picture-perfect prints, insert 20 sheets (two packs of paper and cleaning sheets) at a time and make sure the barcode is facing left and glossy side is facing right. 
Stick to What You Love 
Peel off the adhesive backing and stick your favorite photo memories in your scrapbook, journal, laptop, and more. 
No Ink. No Hassles. No Compromises. 
Zink technology works like magic without the need for ink. Each sheet is embedded with heat-activated color crystals that bring bright, vibrant photos to life. 
Next page
How do I create an event? 
Creating an event is fast and easy. Simply choose and customize your layout from the available categories, select event settings like print limits and more, and get the party started. 
How do I take photos? 
Once you've set up an event, taking a photo is simple. Just choose your desired frame and filters, check out the live view on the screen to make sure everything looks good. Then, simply tap the camera icon, strike a pose, and let the countdown begin! 
How can I share photos? 
Share photos how you like. Digital photo sharing is made easy by generating a QR code via Wi-Fi that lets you download and share photos in a snap. Otherwise, you can print multiple physical copies at a time and share. 
What ZINK paper can I use? 
The HP Sprocket Photobooth is only compatible with HP 3x4 Zink photo paper, which is specially designed to work with your photobooth. Additional paper is available for purchase in the app or from other retailers. 
How do I connect to the HP Sprocket Photobooth app? 
First, connect to Wi-Fi and download the app from Google Play or the App Store on your Android or iOS device. Then, scan the QR code to pair your photobooth with the app and stay notified on paper jams, device status, and more.

title: Epson Expression Photo XP-8800 Wireless Printer with 6-Color Claria Ink System, Borderless Printing up to 8.5" x 11", Fast 4" x 6" Photo Printing, 4.3" Color Touchscreen, Built-in Scanner and Copier
breadCrumbs: Office Products › Office Electronics › Printers & Accessories › Printers › Photo Printers › Desktop Photo Printers
description: Express your creativity to the fullest with the Expression Photo XP-8800. Perfect for printing family photos, greeting cards, art projects and more, this all-in-one solution uses innovative 6-color Claria Photo HD ink to produce professional-quality borderless prints up to 8.5" x 11". And it’s fast—capable of printing incredibly crisp, detailed 4" x 6" photos in as fast as 10 seconds (1). Compact and easy to use, the XP-8800 fits virtually anywhere and features a large, 4.3" color touchscreen for simple navigation. The printer offers Easy Mode, so you can customize your control panel and quickly access your preferred functions. Plus, with built-in wireless and compatibility with the Epson Smart Panel app (2), the XP-8800 supports fast, convenient printing from your laptop or smart device (3).* This product uses only genuine Epson-brand ink cartridges. Other brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies are not compatible and, even if described as compatible, may not function properly or at all. | 1. Color photo in Draft Mode on Premium Photo Paper Glossy measured from start of paper feed. Actual print times will vary based on factors including system configuration, software and page complexity. For more information, visit www.epson.com/printspeed | 2. Requires Epson Smart Panel app download. Data usage fees may apply. | 3. Most features require an Internet connection to the printer, as well as an Internet- and/or email-enabled device. For a list of Epson Connect enabled printers and compatible devices and apps, visit www.epson.com/connect | 4. Wi-Fi CERTIFIED; level of performance subject to the range of the router being used. Wi-Fi Direct may require printer software. | 5. Requires Creative Print Mobile App download and a compatible smart device. Data usage fees may apply. For more information, please visit Epson.com/support
features: Lab-quality photos and prints — 6-color Claria Photo HD ink and high print resolution for amazing borderless prints up to 8.5" x 11"
Fast photo printing — delivers 4" x 6" borderless photos with astounding detail and accuracy in as fast as 10 seconds (1)
Convenient, easy operation — features flush 4.3" color touchscreen, plus Easy Mode for enhanced visibility and ease of use
Versatile paper handling — separate trays for plain and photo paper, plus a rear feed for specialty paper
Easy wireless printing — print from your laptop, desktop, smartphone or tablet (3); use Wi-Fi Direct (4) for router-free printing
Built-in scanner and copier — high-resolution flatbed scanner for crisp, accurate scans and copies
Epson Smart Panel app (2) — control your printer from your smart device and enjoy timesaving, smart setup features
Creative Print mobile app (5) — easily print photos and create custom cards, stationery and more
Easily adjust photos — includes tools for red-eye removal, photo restoration and more
Epson printing system is designed to be used exclusively with Epson Genuine Cartridges*. Use of non-genuine ink could cause damage not covered under the printer’s ltd. wnty.

features: Cost-Effective, Ink-Free Printing: The mobile phone printers offers an economical solution for everyday printing needs, eliminating the need for ink, toner, and ribbons. Print recipes, forms, letters, assignments, study materials, and travel documents hassle-free with advanced thermal technology. Crisp Printing Quality & Long Battery Life: Experience crystal-clear printing with our portable travel printer, featuring 2 built-in 2600mAh batteries for continuous printing of up to 3 hours and 360 sheets on a single charge. With a remarkable 90 days standby time, this wireless printer is a must-have for businessmen and students on the move.

Adjustable Paper Sizes & Reliable After-Sale Support: Print documents ranging from 2 to 8.5 inches in size, accommodating various needs. We are committed to providing exceptional after-sale service, offering tech support via phone and email. Whether you have inquiries before or after using our portable wireless printer, our dedicated team is here to assist you promptly and effectively.

description: INSTAX SQUARE LINK Smartphone Printer with Bluetooth capabilities connects you to your friends and family with the INSTAX Connect™ App feature. Using the free downloadable INSTAX SQUARE LINK App, easily share INSTAX SQUARE images digitally from your Smartphone. Select a Smartphone image, add text or effects and send it to your Besties! And by adding an Augmented Reality (AR) effect to your Smartphone image in the App through a QR code that is applied to the printed INSTAX photo, you can bring your physical INSTAX SQUARE instant prints to life by later scanning the printed QR code with your Smartphone. The INSTAX SQUARE LINK Smartphone Printer is available in Ash White or Midnight Green.
features: Small and lightweight Connects wirelessly via Bluetooth to your Smartphone Requires download of Free INSTAX SQUARE LINK Smartphone App
For use with INSTAX SQUARE instant film only (sold separately) Film Size 3.39” x 2.83” and Image Size 2.44” x 2.44”

Use the AR Print App Feature by applying a QR code to a printed INSTAX photo and then scan the printed code with a Smartphone to view the AR content on your Smartphone INSTAX CONNECT App feature allows you to share photos and messages with loved ones
Add fun, decorative frames, sketches, and stickers to your Smartphone images prior to printing your INSTAX photo Print an INSTAX image from your videos
Built-in rechargeable battery (can print approximately 100 INSTAX prints per charge)

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
FUJIFILM INSTAX SQUARE LINK Smartphone Printer 
Expand your vision with the INSTAX SQUARE LINK Smartphone Printer that not only fascinates- it connects you to your friends and family with Bluetooth capabilities and with the INSTAX Connect App feature. Because your best moments in life deserve the chance to burst free from their “frame”. 
Instax Square Link Tutorial 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Instax Square Art and Party 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
AR PRINT MODE 
Use the AR Print feature of the INSTAX SQUARE LINK App to create endless creative possibilities for your Smartphone images. AR Print is the first INSTAX App feature to give your viewed Smartphone images an extra dimension. Use the App to add an AR effect to your Smartphone image through a QR code that is applied to your printed INSTAX photo. Then just scan the QR code on the photo to see the added AR content appear on your Smartphone! 
Sent with love 
INSTAX Connect 
From one corner of the earth to the other, the INSTAX SQUARE LINK Smartphone printer keeps you connected, no matter how far apart you are. Using the free, downloadable INSTAX SQUARE LINK App, share your INSTAX SQUARE images digitally from your Smartphone. Select a Smartphone image, add text or effects, , and send it your Besties! . They can respond by sending a message back directly on the image and with an INSTAX SQUARE LINK Smartphone Printer, they can even print the photo they have received. 
Scrub and print 
Video Print 
Have an action-packed video but want to freeze a frame in time? Use the INSTAX SQUARE LINK App to print a still INSTAX SQUARE photo from your video of that furry friend who won’t stop moving. 
It’s a sticker-off 
Stickers 
Why limit yourself to just one sticker per shot, when you’ve got over 1,600 in-App stickers to choose from? From ‘Happy Birthday’ stickers to ‘I Love You’ stickers, you’ll soon know your favorites, ready for you to effortlessly add BEFORE printing.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Easy to Use - Only 4 Steps Needed 
Turn on the MiniPrinter 
Install a T02 Thermal Paper Roll 
Put the Holder with Paper Back to the Machine 
Connect Bluetooth in APP 
T02 Mini Sticker Printer Introduction 
Printer Lid Button: press here to open the thermal printer lid.
Reset Button: reset the mini printer when there is issue you can't solve.
Charging Port: fast and stable charging for T02 portable printer.
Indicator Light: the light is red when no enough power/green and flashes when charging.
Paper Holder: use it to avoid printing alignment issue.
ON/OFF: remember to turn the bluetooth printer off after every use.
Rubber Roller: clean it regularly with a cotton stick wet by alcohol to improve printing quality.

Usage Notice 
Please connect Bluetooth from APP.
No paper alert: take the paper roll out, then long press the power button for 10 seconds until you see green light flashes 2 times. After that, put that paper into the machine again to print normally.
The printed content is easy to shift without the paper holder.
Birthday/Christmas Gift Combo 
For Children/Kids/Women/Girls 
T02 sticker printer comes with 3 rolls of printing papers which are all put inside a delicate gift box. Pick it up for your love. 
Tips for Better Printing: 
Charge the machine regularly. When the power is low, the printouts will be blurred.
Moisten a cotton swab with alcohol, and gently wipe the print head regularly to clean dust.
Select high-pixel pictures to print instead of blurred pictures.
Reduce the noise of pictures before printing for better effects.

title: Fujifilm Instax Mini Link 2 Smartphone Printer - Clay White
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Camera & Photo › Printers & Scanners › Portable Photo Printers
description: Creativity is in the AiR with the INSTAX MINI LINK 2 Smartphone Printer The INSTAX MINI LINK 2 Smartphone Printer connects to your Smartphone wirelessly in a simple, yet super fun way! Connect to your Smartphone via the free downloadable INSTAX MINI LINK App and watch creativity flow with the all-new INSTAXAiR feature. Add bubbles, petals, neon, spray paint or even glitter to your Smartphone photo by drawing in the air with the INSTAX MINI LINK 2 device, all before printing out onto INSTAX MINI instant film. You can even record a video of the drawing and share the moment as a printable QR code, ready to scan with a Smartphone. There are so many ways to add your personality to your photos using the INSTAXAiR motion control, the fast-paced Match Test feature including the “Go with your instinct” Mode, the Print from Video feature, plus so much more! This striking printer packs a whole lot of creativity!
features: Compact and lightweight. Connects wirelessly via Bluetooth to your Smartphone
For use with INSTAX MINI instant film only (sold separately) - Prints 2” x 3” photos
Add frames, filters, sketches and stickers prior to printing. Print photos from videos
Using the INSTAXAiR feature, add doodles or shapes to your photos. Record your drawing and print a QR code on your image
Includes MINI LINK 2 Printer, USB Cable & 1-year Limited Product Warranty

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
The NEW INSTAX MINI LINK 2 
Creativity is in the AiR 
The INSTAX MINI LINK 2 Smartphone Printer inspires creativity and priceless interactions with your friends and family. Connect the printer to your Smartphone via the free, downloadable INSTAX MINI LINK App and watch creativity flow with the all-new INSTAXAiR feature and the much-loved Match Test App feature. Get ready to print and give more with the INSTAX MINI LINK 2 Smartphone Printer! 
INSTAXAiR 
Blast off 
Use Bluetooth connectivity to pair your Smartphone, download the free INSTAX MINI LINK App and watch creativity flow with the all-new INSTAXAiR feature. Add bubbles, petals, neon, spray paint or even glitter to your Smartphone image by drawing in the air with the INSTAX MINI LINK 2 Printer, all before printing out onto INSTAX MINI instant film. 
SIMPLE PRINT 
Swipe ‘n’ Print 
Getting your images into the real world is both easy and quick using the free, downloadable INSTAX MINI LINK App. Connect your Smartphone wirelessly to the INSTAX MINI LINK 2 Smartphone Printer, select the photo on your Smartphone you want to print, add text, resize, apply a filter, and play with the contrasts before swiping up to print. 
VIDEO PRINT 
Poetry in motion 
Not all experiences are captured motionless - who doesn’t love a memory from a favorite video? With the free, downloadable INSTAX MINI LINK App, you can scroll through your favorite videos, select that magical moment, and print an INSTAX MINI image of it on your INSTAX MINI LINK 2 Smartphone printer! 
MATCH TEST 
Great minds… 
…think alike? Test your compatibility with you and your friends by using the “Go with your instinct” Mode in the Match Test App feature and wait for the printer to print your compatibility score (up to 100) on your photo. If you’re more of a quiz sort of gang, answer the questions and print out the results on a picture of you and your BFF.
